32a2('dul ba): chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyu re legs/nyes byas//za ma dang ma ning dang /dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /ma gsod pa dang /pha gsod pa dang /dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang /mu
32a3('dul ba): stegs can dang /mu stegs can zhugs pa dang //rku thab su gnas pa dang /dang po mi mthun pa can dang /sngar ltung ba byung ba la gzhi ma mchis par pham par 'gyur ba'i chos kyis skur pa
32a4('dul ba): btab na cir 'gyur lags/nyes pa sbom por 'gyu ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma la gzhi mi mchis par pham par 'gyur ba'i chos kyis skur po btab na cir 'gyur
32a5('dul ba): lags/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga ngan sems kyi khrag 'byin pa dang /gnas par mi bye ba dang /tha dad du gnas
32a6('dul ba): pa dang /khas blangs pa dang /bslabs pa sprul pa'i dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur//
32a7('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong zhig gis/dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa 'dengs pa las/de'i mtshan gyur te dge slong mang red ni cir 'gyur lags/dge 'dun
32b1('dul ba): lhag mar 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong ma zhig gis/dge slong ma la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa 'debs pa las/de'i mtshan gyur te dge slong du redan cir 'gyur
32b2('dul ba): lags/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes pas/gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab
32b3('dul ba): na cir 'gyur lags/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'du shes pas/gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur
32b4('dul ba): lags/nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro//bsnyen pad ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes pas gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/nyes pa
32b5('dul ba): sbom por 'gyur ro//bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes pas gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur ba bta' na cir 'gyur lags/nyes pa sbom por
32b6('dul ba): 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis mi'i dge slong la mir 'du shes pas gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyuraro///
32b7('dul ba): mi la mi ma lags par 'du shes pas/gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//mi la mi ma lags par 'du shes pas/
33a1('dul ba): gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro//mi ma lags pa la mir 'du shes pas/pham pa'i chos
33a2('dul ba): kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/nyes pa sgom par 'gyur ro//mi ma lags pa la mi ma lags par 'du shes pas/gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab
33a3('dul ba): na cir 'gyur lags/nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro//sdom la//dang po mtha' dang mtshams med pa//lhag ma da ni cig la cig/bris pa dang ni bag tsam nyid//rgya cher bya ba nyid//
33a4('dul ba): yin no//btsun pa re shig dge slong bdag nyid ngas mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa las byung ba'i chos bston to//zhes khas len pa de la dge slong zhig gis/gzhi ma mchis par rku ba
33a5('dul ba): dang /gsod pa'am/bla mar gyur pa'i chos smra bas skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong bdag nyid ngas yo byad chen po rkus so zhes
33a6('dul ba): khas len pa de la dge slong zhig gis gzhi ma mchis par gsod pa 'am/bla mar gyur pa'i chos smra ba 'am mi tshangs par spyod pas skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/dge 'dun lhags mas
33a7('dul ba): 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong bdag nyid ngas mi srog dang phral lo zhes khas len pa de la/dge slong zhig gi sa gzhi ma mchis par bla mar gyur pa'i chos smra'am/mi tshangs par
33b1('dul ba): spyod pa 'am/rku bas skur ba btang na cir 'gyur lags//dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong bdag nyid ngas mi'i chos bla mar gyur pa smraso zhes khas len pa de la/dge slong
33b2('dul ba): zhig gis gzhi ma mchis par mi tshangs par spyod pa 'am/rku ba 'am/srog gcid par skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
33b3('dul ba): slong gis dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par phamo pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na/dge 'du ni lhag mar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong la gzhi
33b4('dul ba): ma mchis par mtshams med pas skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/gal te ma dang pa dang /dgra bcom pa gsod pas skur pa btab na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur//'on te gzhi med par dge
33b5('dul ba): 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dang /ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pas skur pa btab na ni/nyes byas so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nye ba 'khor gang gis pha dang ma dang /dgra bcom pa gsod pas skur
33b6('dul ba): pa btab pa de ni/pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab pa yin no//gang gis dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dang /ngan sems kyi khrag 'byin par skur pa btab pa des ni/nyes pa sbom pos skur
33b7('dul ba): pa btab pa yin te/nyes pa sbom pos ni dge slong ma yin par mi 'gyur gyi/de ni bshegs par 'os pa yin no//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par pham ci
34a1('dul ba): chos kyis skur pa btab na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur na/grul te gzhi ma mchi sdu par dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ltung byed du
34a2('dul ba): 'gyur ro//gzhi ma mchis par so sor bshams par bgyi ba dang /nyes byas kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags nyes byaso//de bzhin du gzhi ma mchis par nyes pa sbom pos
34a3('dul ba): skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dge slong la gzhi med par/pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na ni/dge 'dun lhag mar
34a4('dul ba): 'gyur ro//zhes gsungs pa gang lags po/btsun pa re shig dge slong gis/dge slob ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul ma la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir
34a5('dul ba): 'gyur lags/nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro//dge slong mas dge slong ma la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/dge 'dun lcug mar 'gyu ro//dge
34a6('dul ba): slong mas dge slong la pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul ma la gzhi ma mchis par pham
34a7('dul ba): pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur legs/nyes pa sbom por 'gyu ro//dge slob mas/dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge slob ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul ma la gzhi
34b1('dul ba): ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//dge tshul gyis dge sbyong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge slob ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul ma la gzhi/
34b2('dul ba): ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//dge tshul mas dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge slob ma dang /dge tshul dang /
34b3('dul ba): dge tshul ma la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis bdag nyid kyis bris nas/'di skad ces yi ge 'di las ni
34b4('dul ba): 'di skad du khyod mi tshangs par spyod pa'i pham pa byung zhes ze ro zhe sa mchi na/cir 'gyur lags/nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro//btsun pa dge slong gis/dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis
34b5('dul ba): skur pa btab kyang /dge 'dun lhag mar mi 'gyur ba mchis lags sam/yod de/sngar ltung ba byung ba dang /rku thabs su gnas pa dang /dang po mi mthun pa can dang /ma ning dang /dge slong ma sun phyung ba la
34b6('dul ba): ni nyes byas so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang khros shing zhes sdang bar gyur nas/ci nas kyang 'di tshangs
34b7('dul ba): par spyod pa dang bralo snyam nas/dge slong dag pa ltung ba med pase//gzhan gyi cha dang 'thun pa ma yin pa pham par 'gyur ba'i chos kyis skar pa btab pa las/de dus gzhan zhig na/dris kyang rung /ma dris kyang
35a1('dul ba): rung ba rtsod pa de gzhan gyi cha dang 'thun pa ma yin pa yin la/rtsod pa gzhan gyi cha dang 'thun pa ma yin pas/bag tsam las bsams pa tsam gyi chos 'ga' zhig blangs par gyur la dge
35a2('dul ba): slong de yang zhe sdang la gnas pas zhe sdang gis smraso zhe na/dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa zhes bya ba ste/gzhung lhag ma ni gzhi med pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/bag tsam la rgya cher brjod
35a3('dul ba): par bya'o//sdo ma la bshes pa dang ni gsol ba dang //gleng ba dang ni dran pa gnyis//bzhi pa 'dug dang ma bskos dang //'dun pas gcig dang na mkha' la//'dug pa rgyas pa nyid du bya//sangs
35a4('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis nus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang dge 'dun 'thun pa dbye ba'i phyir/rdul bar byed cing dbyen byed par 'gyur
35a5('dul ba): ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas/rab tu bzung ste 'dug nas dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod/dge 'dun 'thun pa dbye ba'i phyir rgyal bar ma byed cing //dbyen byed
35a6('dul ba): par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste ma 'dug shig/tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun dang 'thun par gyis shing /dge 'dun 'thun mi phyed kun tu dga' mi rtsod mchog cig 'don
35a7('dul ba): pa gcig cing /chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed pa bde ba dang reg par gnas par 'gyur gyis/tshe dang ldan pa khyod dge 'dun 'byed pa'i gzhi 'di
35b1('dul ba): lta bu 'di thong shog ces bsgo bar byara'o//dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis do skang bsgo ba na gal te gzhi de gtang na de lta na legs/gal te mi gtang na gzhing gtong bar bya ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan
35b2('dul ba): gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya/yang dag par bstan par bya'o//lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo/yang dag par bstan pa na/gzhi de gtong na de lta na lags/gal te mi gtogs dge 'du
35b3('dul ba): lhag ma'o zhes gsungs pa gang logs pa/btsun pa re shig dge slong gis bshes pa'i tshig gis ma bsgo bar gsol ba dang /bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bgyid na/bsgo ba zhes bgyi ba 'am/'on te ma bsgo
35b4('dul ba): ba zhes bgyi lags/bka' sprul pa ma bsgo ba zhes bya'o//bsgob 'chags lags sam/nye bar 'khor mi 'chags te/dge 'dun la yang des 'gal tshabs can
35b5('dul ba): /du 'gyur ro//btsun pa bshes pa'i tshig gis bsgo nas gsol pa dang /bzhi'i las kyis bsgon bsgo ba zhes bgyi 'am/'on te ma bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags/bka' stsal pa bsgo ba zhes bya'o//bsgo 'chags
35b6('dul ba): lags sam/nye ba dang khor 'chags te/dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshangs can du mi 'gyur//btsun pa bslad pa'i las ma bgyis par ba shes pa'i tshig gis bsgo bar babyed na/bsgo bzhes bgyi 'am/
35b7('dul ba): 'on te ma bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags/bka' stsal pa ma bsgo zhes bya'o//bsgo ba chags lags sam/nye bar ra khor mi 'chags te/dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//btsun pa
36a1('dul ba): bskrad pa'i las bgyis te bshes pa'i tshig gis bsgo bar bgyid na/bsgo ba zhes bgyi'am/'on te masgo ba zhes bgyi lags/bka' stsa la pa/pad+mo ba zhes bya'o//bsgre ba 'cha
36a2('dul ba): lags sam/nye bar 'khor 'chags te/dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro//btsun pa bskrad pa'i las ma bgyis par dge 'dun la 'dun pas 'gro ba'o zhes mchi zhing zhe sdang
36a3('dul ba): gis 'gro ba dang /gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /'jigs pas 'gro ba'o zhes mchin cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so//bsgo bar bgyi 'am/'on te bsgo bar mi bgyi lags/bka' stsal pa/
36a4('dul ba): bsgo bar mi bya'o//bsgo ba 'chags sam/nye bar 'khor mi 'chags te/dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//bskrad pa'i las bgyis nas/dge 'dun la 'dun pas 'gro ba'o/
36a5('dul ba): zhes mchi zhing zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /'jigs pas 'gro ba'o zhes mchi na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsgo bar bgyi'am 'on te bsgo bar mi bgyi lags/
36a6('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/bsgo bar bya'o//bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/nye bar 'khor 'chags te/dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur//btsun pa re shig ma glengs dran par ma bgyis
36a7('dul ba): pas dag pa/'dzi ba la gnas par byedan cing gyur chags nyis byam sa//'azla bar 'tsho ma/'an pa ng+gApa mtsho ga ci/ kyil pa byam/
36b1('dul ba): 'chags lags sam/nye bar 'khor mi 'chags so//btsun pa re shig glengs shing dran par bgyis pa las bdag nyid bka' blo mi bde ba la gnas par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/nyes
36b2('dul ba): byas so//bsgo bar bgyi'am/'on te bsgo bar mi bgyi legs/bka' stsal pa/bsgo bar bya'o//bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/nye bar 'khor 'chags so//mtshams kyi nang na
36b3('dul ba): mchis pa dag gis/mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa la bsgo na bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/nye bar 'khor ma yin no//mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa dag gis/mtshams kyi nang na mchis
36b4('dul ba): pa dag la bsgo na/bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/nye bar 'khor ma yin no//btsun parare shig dge slong las bgyid pa mtshams kyi nang na mchis pas/mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa dag las
36b5('dul ba): bsgo na/bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/nye bar 'khor ma yin no//btsun pa re shig dge slong las bgyid pa mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pas/mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa dag la bsgon
36b6('dul ba): bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/nye bar 'khor ma yin no//btsun pa re zhig dge slong las bgyid pas mtshams mnan cing /mtshams non par bgyis te/mtsham su mchis nas brtson bsgob
36b7('dul ba): zhes dgyi'am/ma bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags/nye bar 'khor bsgo ba zhes bya'o//bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/nye bar 'khor 'chag so//btsun pa dge slong las bgyid par ma bsgos pa zhig
37a1('dul ba): gis mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa'i gang zag bzhi bskrad na/bskrad pa zhes bgyi lags sum nye bar 'a khar ma yin no//btsun pa re shig dge slong las bgyid par brnas
37a2('dul ba): pas/mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa'i gang zag bzhi zhig bslad na/bskrad po zhes bgyi lags sam/gal te /re ru dang /gnyis gnyis dang /gsum gsum nas bskyed kyi bzhir ma yin na/
37a3('dul ba): bskrad pa zhes bya'o//btsun pa dge slong las bgyid pas mtshams kyi nang phyogs bzhin/mtshungs par gnas pa'i dge slong mchis pa dag gis/dge slong bzhi zhig la bsgon/bsgo bar yang
37a4('dul ba): chud la ltung ba yang gang du yang mi 'gyur zhing des dge 'dun mi 'thun par yang mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/nye bar 'khor gal te phan tshun 'dun pa byin pas/re re dang gnyis gnyis
37a5('dul ba): dang /gsum gsum la bsgo/bzhi la ma yin na yod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshogs kyis tshogs kyi las dgra byar mi rung bas so//las bgyid pa phyogs gcig na mchis pas gnas
37a6('dul ba): bzhi'i las thams cad bgyir rung lags sam/nye bar 'khor 'di ltar dge slong las byed pas gnas bzhi cor gyi mtshams kyi mdo//bri 'am khri'u 'am/raM lde ljongs rings kyis mnan te 'dug par
37a7('dul ba): gyur la/gnas de dag na yang las 'di lta bu 'di lta ste/bzhi'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las dang /lnga'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las dang /bcu'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las dang /nyi shu'i tshogs kyis bya
37b1('dul ba): ba'i las ngang /nyi shu'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i lus nye bar gnas par gyur na rung //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de de dag kha cig gi ni lus byed pa yin la/kha cig gi ni tshogs skong ba yin no//sa la/
37b2('dul ba): mchis pas na mkha' la mchis pa rnams la bsgon/bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/nye bar 'o khor ma yin no//btsun pa re shig los bgyid pa na mkha' la mchis la/sel mchis pa rnams
37b3('dul ba): la bsgo na bsgo ba zhes bgyi legs sam/nye bar 'khor ma yin no//ji ltar dge slong la dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ba ji lta ba de bzhin du bslab pa byin pa dang /dge slong ma la yang dge 'dun lhag
37b4('dul ba): mar 'gyur ro//dge slob ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul mu rnams la ni nyes byas so//sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la yang nyes byas kho na ste/snga ma bzhin no//de ltar na gzhung 'di na dge
37b5('dul ba): 'dun lhag ma gsum la yang /tso rigs par brjod par bya ba yin no//nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/kha che ba las dge 'dun lhag ma rdzog s+ho////sdom la/mtha' dang lam dang rgyal
37b6('dul ba): rigs dang //phung po de bzhin lhag ma dang //kha dang sha khA ra drang hwags//bu rum mar gsar ma dris gnyis//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/
37b7('dul ba): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig gcig pu gcig dang /dben pa skyabs yod pa ni 'dod pa byar rung bar/sten la 'dug par byed cing de la gal
38a1('dul ba): te dge bsnyen ma yod chos byu chog dang rdzun pas/chos gsas po ma par 'gyu /ngag/dum ma ma//s+yAng pyod la sdu gang yang dru bas smras byu gyur//
38a2('dul ba): la dge slong gis 'dug par khas blangasan chos gsum pa phan par 'gyur ba 'am/dge 'dun lhag ma 'am/ltung byed las chos gang yang rung bas byed du gzhug cing /dge sbyong de yi
38a3('dul ba): bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas//chos gas dang gang gis smras pa 'gyur che tshotsho de dang des dge slong ngo byed du gzhug ste/de ni mangs po'i chos so//yang dge slong gang du
38a4('dul ba): da kyi du la dang ldan cig gcig sreg cig dzung dzin basbyangs meng drin/'di pa rgya rgya na na sbyid nga/de mi ma ti ge sbyinam smi rjes 'tshig smyan papa/
38a5('dul ba): de'i chos de dang po//dge sbyo de byed du go ga ste/de yang mnges pa'i rgyas nis gsuMs pa gang lags pa/btsur pa tshonag dge bsnyen ma yid rjes pa'i tshigadang ldan pa zhig ge slong
38a6('dul ba): kyi drung du mchis nas/'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong mtha' dang po 'byin par bgyid par mthong ngo zhes mchin/dge ma yid ches pa'i tshig deng ldan pa'i tshig gis
38b1('dul ba): ban+d+ha dang sprul dam/khyed du mi gzhug go//da rdzan nyid tshal du stsal tam mi gzhug ste/ro shig de la don che zhe zla 'gra' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o//gal tu 'ang sprad ces yang du zhus zer na/gaN+Dan//
38b2('dul ba): la dri 'dabye ste/gal te 'thun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gi byed du gzhug cing /de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go//'on te de skad ces 'di mtha' dang po ni me byung gi nyon gyi
38b3('dul ba): bdag gos/mtha' gnyis pa dang /gsum dang /bzhi pa byung ba mthong ngo zhes zer na/dge slong la rmed du gzhug go//dang po ji lta bar mtha' gnyis pa dang /gsum dang /bzhi pa rnams la yang de bzhin
38b4('dul ba): du brjod par bya'o//btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches de'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/dge slong rnams kyi drung du mdzes nas/'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig gis kha'i lam du nyams par bgyi
38b5('dul ba): nga de nas mtshan//dge bsnyen ma med ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis brjod du stsal te ma/byed du d+h+r-i gsuM//de dzin nyid kyil du sprul d+ha/sdi gzug ste/ra 'i rkye zla'
38b6('dul ba): yodang ma zhesang bar bya'o//gal te 'di da ces yod de zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/gal te 'thun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing /de de'i
38b7('dul ba): dugazhug//'on te de 'di da ces 'dis kha'i lam du ni nyams pa sa byas te/'on kyang bshang ba'i lam dang gci ba'i lam du nyams par byas po zhes zer na/dge slong la rme gzhug go//kha'i lam du tri
39a1('dul ba): /bar bshang ba'i lam dang /gtso ba'i lam du yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o//btsun pa dgeg bsnyen ma yid tshos pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces/
39a2('dul ba): btsun pa dag dge slong zhig rgyal rig ma zhig dang lhan cig tu nyams par bgyid pa bdag gis mthong ngo zhes mchi na dge bsnyen ma mingad ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du sprul tam/byed du ma
39a3('dul ba): gzhug go/de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/mi gzhug ste/re shig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o//gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/gal te
39a4('dul ba): 'thun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing /de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug/'on te de 'di skad cig 'dis rgyal rigs dang lhan cig tu nyams par na mi
39a5('dul ba): byas na/'on kyang bram ze mo dang lhan cig tu nyams par gyur to zhes dz+wa ra na/dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/rgyal rigs mo dang ji lta bar bram ze mo'i dang /rje'u rigs mo dang /dmangs
39a6('dul ba): rigs mo dang /dkar mo dang /sngon mo dang /sngo sangs mo dang /ring mo dang thud du mo dang /sbu gu ma dang /skem mo dang /tshon mo dang /lus ngan ma dang /'gro ba dang 'dug da dang /'grong ba dang /
39a7('dul ba): 'gyel ba dang /yang rgya sa par brjod par bya'o//btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas/'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis
39b1('dul ba): dge slong nag mtha' dang po'i bung po 'byin par bgyod pa mthong ngo zhes mtshon/dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i zhog gos bgyid du su lA tam/khyod du ma gzhug go//de de'i ngo bo nyid du//
39b2('dul ba): tshal du stsal tam/mi gzhug ste/ro shig de la che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o//gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/gal te 'thun na dge bsnyen ma 'i
39b3('dul ba): ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing /de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go//'on te 'di skad ces mtha' dang po'i phung po ni me byung gi 'on kyang ltung ba'i phung po gnyis pa dang /
39b4('dul ba): gsum pa dang /bzhi pa dang /lnga ba byung ngo zhes bya ba rgyas par brjod do//btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas/'di skad ces
39b5('dul ba): btsun pa dge bdag gis dge slong zhig dge 'dun lhag ma dang po 'byin par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchi na//dge bsnyen ma lcid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/byed
39b6('dul ba): du mi gzhug go/de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsa la tAm/mi gzhug ste/ra shig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o//gal te 'dri skad ces yod do zhes zer na/gnyi ga la
39b7('dul ba): dri bar bya ste/gal te 'thun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cig/de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug/'on te de 'di skad ces dge 'dun lhag ma dang po ni
40a1('dul ba): ma byung gi 'on kyang dge 'dun lhag ma gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang /bzhi pa nas bcu gsum pa'i bar byung ngo zhes zer na/dge slong la rmed du gzhug go//dang po la rdza
40a2('dul ba): bar dge 'dun lhag ma gnyis dang /gsum pa na sa bcu gsum pa'i bar la sa bya das nini phu brjod par bya ma//btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas/dge slong rnams kyi rdu
40a3('dul ba): du mchis nas/'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong gi khar nyams par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchi na/dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam
40a4('dul ba): byed du mi gzhug go/de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam mi gzhug ste/re shig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o//gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar
40a5('dul ba): bya ste/gal te 'thun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing de de'i rang bzhin tshol du gzhug go/'on te 'di skad ces khar ni nyams par ma byas kyi/'on
40a6('dul ba): kyang 'dis so'i phyi la mchu'i nang du khu ba phyung zhes zer na/dge slong la rmed du gzhug go//btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas
40a7('dul ba): 'di skad ces/btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig gci ba'i lam du nyams par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchi na/dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam byed du mi
40b1('dul ba): gtsug ga/de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du sA la tA ma/mI gzhug s+ho/ro shAH/de la don tshwanon 'ga' yod dmazhes ba byara'o//gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/gnyi ga la dro bar bya
40b2('dul ba): ste/gal te 'thun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing /da de'i ngo bo nyid tshul du gzhug/'on te de 'di skad ces gci ba'i lam du ni nyams
40b3('dul ba): par ma byas kyi/'on kyang 'dis brla phrag tu khu ba phyung ngo zhes zer na/dge slong la rmed du gzhug go//btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di
40b4('dul ba): skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig gis bshang ba'i lam du nyams par bgyis pa mthong ngo zhes mchin/dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsa la
40b5('dul ba): byed du mi gzhug go//de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam mi gzhug ste/re shig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o//gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri ba bya ste/
40b6('dul ba): gal te 'thun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing /de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go//'on te de 'di skad ces gshang ba'i lam du ni nyams par ma byas kyi/'on
40b7('dul ba): kyar 'dis chub ces kyi phrag tu khu ba phyung ngo zhes zer na/dge slong la rmed du gzhug/btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces
41a1('dul ba): /btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig dus ma yon par sgom 'thung ngang drang ngo zhes mtshan dge bskyon ma yod chos nga'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsa la tu
41a2('dul ba): byed du mi gzhug go//de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal te ma/re shig de la de na tshe zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o//gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/
41a3('dul ba): gal te 'thun nu dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing /de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol dro gzhugo//'on te de 'di skad ces dus ma yin par sgro ma ni ma'i
41a4('dul ba): kyi 'on kyang 'dis sha kha re'i chu 'thungs so zhes zer na/dge slong la rmed du gzhug/btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas/
41a5('dul ba): smad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig bu ma chang 'thung ngo zhes mi chi na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gos bgyid du sprul tem/byed du mi gzhug go//de dri'i
41a6('dul ba): ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tA ma mi gzhug ste/re shig de la de na tshe zhi zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o//gal te 'di skad ces yod do//zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/gal te
41a7('dul ba): 'thun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing /de de'i ngo ba nyid tshol du gzhug go/'on te 'di skad ces 'di dus ma yin par bu ma gyi chang ma 'chus
41b1('dul ba): kyi 'on kyang 'dis hwags kyi chu 'thung so zhes zer na dge slong la rmed du gzhug go//bam po bzhi pa////btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/dge slong rnams
41b2('dul ba): kyi drung du mchis nas/'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig dus ma yin par sha za ba mthong ngo zhes mchi na/dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam byed du
41b3('dul ba): mi gzhug go/de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du su la tam/mi gzhug te/re shig dri la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o//gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar bya
41b4('dul ba): ste/gal te 'thun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cig/de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go//'on te 'di skad ces dus ma yin par sha ni ma zos kyi don
41b5('dul ba): kyang 'dis bu ram zhig zos so zhes zer na/dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas/'di skad ces btsun
41b6('dul ba): dag bdag gis dge slong zhig dus ma lags par kha zas za ba mthong ngo zhes mchi na/dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du sprul te mu byed du mi gzhug go/de de'i
41b7('dul ba): ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/mi gzhug ste/re shig de la de na che zhes zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o//gal te 'di skad cis yod do zhes zer na/gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/gal te 'thun na de/
42a1('dul ba): /bstan ma yid ches pa chog dang ldan pa zlog gis byed drug zhug cing /de da ngan nad tshal du gtsug na na te 'do na kyis dus ma ldan pa 'ongs nam sa /
42a2('dul ba): 'on kyang 'dis mar zos so zhes zer na/dge slong la rmed du gzhug go//de lta bu'i dngos po ma nges pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa bden pa mthong ba smra ba gang dag yin pa
42a3('dul ba): dkal/dge slong la med du gzhug go//nye bar 'khor gyis nus pa//khaN+DI ba~M lam+b+ha mangs pa dang ldan pa rdzogs s+ho///sdom la//de nyid skye dang tshig padang/sems la khrugs
42a4('dul ba): gyis ma brlabs dang //rlung byi dang ni dus las 'das//mtshon dang bzhi dang bting ba'o// ma rgya ma com ldan 'anas/menapa rgya kyi khyi khas gyis thus sa//btsun pa
42a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis/dge slong chos gos zin pas chos gos sra brkyang phyung nas zhag bcu'i bar du gos lhag po rung bar ma byas pa bcang bar bya'o//de las
42a6('dul ba): 'das par bcangs na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/btsun pa chos gos de nyid dgung bcu 'das pa yang lags la//de nyid dgung cig bral ba yung lags
42a7('dul ba): palta mchis lags sam//nye b.ro 'khor yod de/'di ltar dge slong gis zhag bcu 'das pa'i chos gos byin gyis brlabs nas/chos gos med pa'i mtshams kyi phyi rol tu hU~M
42b1('dul ba): rang 'char bar byed na chos gos 'di ni zhag bcu 'das pa yang yin la/zhag gcig bral ba yang yin no//btsun pa re shig dge slong gi spang ba'i chos gos nyams par gyur na/ltung
42b2('dul ba): ba bshags por bgyi 'am/nye bar 'khor 'ba' shig pa'i ltung ba bshags par bya'o//gal te ltung ba bshags lags nas slar rnyed na spang bar bgyi 'am/nye bar 'khor ma yin no//btsun pa re shig
42b3('dul ba): dge slong gi spang ba'i chos gos mes tshig gam/zos par gyur na dum bu de dag spang bar bgyis lags sam/nye bar 'khor ma yin te/'ba' shig pa'i ltung ba bshags par bya'o//'on te kun nas
42b4('dul ba): khru gang ba zhig yin na spang bar bya'o//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis chos gos rnyed nas/dgung lnga lon pa dang /sems 'khrugs par gyur na gang nas bzung ste/de'i dgung bcu bgrang bar bgyi
42b5('dul ba): legs gang nas bzung ste rang gi sems phyir rnyed pa nas so//btsun pa dge slong gis chos gos brgyad dam dgu zhig byin gyis ma brlabs/rung bar ma bgyis par nam 'tshe'i bar du bcangs na/
42b6('dul ba): nongs par mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/nye bar 'khor yod de/dge slong gis nyi ma re re zhing chos gos las phyung ste/gzhan byin gyis rlob na'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag
42b7('dul ba): bcu las 'das pa'i chos gos spang ba'o//zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/btsun pa dge slong gis chos gos lhag ma dgung bcu las 'das par bcangs kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur
43a1('dul ba): //blta mchis lags sam/nye bar 'khor yod de/'di ltar gos kyi spun rung bar 'gyur la/rgyu mi rung bar gyur pa dang /rgyu rung bar gyur la spun mi rung bar gyur pa dang /gcig
43a2('dul ba): mi rung bar gyur te/mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang /ba lang gi spu dang /ra ngal dang /ri dgas kyi bal dang /'dres pa dang thag su ma btags pa ste/de lta bu'i tshes gos ni zhag bcu las lhag par bcangs ni
43a3('dul ba): nyes byas su 'gyuraro//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis zhag bcu'i bar du gos lhag pa bcab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/btsun pa de dge slong gis nam
43a4('dul ba): 'tsho'i bar du chos gos lhag pa bcangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/nye bar 'khor yod/zhag bcu tshun chad du dus las 'das par gyur na'o//btsun pa chos gos de nyid
43a5('dul ba): bcangs na ltung bar yang mi 'gyur la/chos gos de nyid bcangs na ltung bar yang 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/nye bar 'khor yod de/'di ltar dge slong de chos gos rin chen po 'tshang
43a6('dul ba): na ltung ba med la mtshan gyur te/dge slong mar red de 'chang na ltung bar 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis chos gos rnyed nas dgung bcu lags pa dang /de'i mtshan gyur nas dge slong
43a7('dul ba): mir red nas dgung bcu 'das na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong mas chos gos shig rnyed nas dgung bcu ma lags pa dang mtshan gyur te/
43b1('dul ba): dge slong du red nas dgung bcu 'das na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dgung bcu la/dgung bcur 'du shes te skya re 'char bar bgyid na
43b2('dul ba): cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//dgung bcu la dgung bcu ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ltung ba med do//dpung bcu ma lags pa la dgung bcur 'du
43b3('dul ba): shes na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas su 'gyur ro//dgung bcu ma lags pa la dgung bcu ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags ltung ba med do//btsun pa re shig dge
43b4('dul ba): slong gis sra brkyang bting ba'i gnasu chos gos shig rnyed la chos gos de yang spang bar 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam nye bor 'khor yod de/'di ltar dge slong gis chos gos
43b5('dul ba): spang ba yin la/dge slong des kyang chos gos de ma spangs bral bar ma byas/nyes pa ma bshags pa'i skabs su dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang bting bar gyur la sra brkyang bting nas/dge
43b6('dul ba): slong des chos gos gzhan zhig rnyed na'o//btsun pa re shig brlab pa stsal pas dgung bcu las lhag par chos gos lhag pa bcangs na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//
43b7('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong mas dgung bcu las lhag par chos gos lhag pa bcangs na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slob ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul
44a1('dul ba): mus dgung bcu las 'das par chos gos lhag pa bcangs na cir 'gyur lags ltung ba med do//sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te/snga ma bzhin no//
44a2('dul ba): sdom la/dge 'dun gyi dngas dang mtshams//mnan pa dang ni ma gnan dang //mtshams ma bcad dang ma g.yogs dang //bzhi tshan dang ni de bzhin mtshan//sangs rgyas bcom ldan
44a3('dul ba): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung na/gal te nub gcig kyang chos gos gsum las chos
44a4('dul ba): gos gang yang rung ba dang /mtshams kyi phyi rol tu 'bral bar byed na/dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/btsun pa dge 'dun gyi
44a5('dul ba): chos gos byin gyis brlab par gnang lags sam/nye bar 'khor mi gan ngo //btsun pa de lta bu'i rkyen zhig mchis na gnang lags sam/nye bar 'khor gnang //btsun pa re shig dge
44a6('dul ba): slong gis dge 'dun gyi chos gos byin gyis brlab te/chos gos ma mchis par mtshams kyi slad rol tu bral bar bgyid na/chos gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi'am chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes
44a7('dul ba): bgyi lags/bka' stsal pa/chos gos dang bral ba zhes bya'o//chos gos de spang bar bgyi lags sam/nye bar 'khor ma yin te/'ba' shig pa'i ltung byed bshags par bya'o//btsun
44b1('dul ba): sa[]\u0f7fsa sa[]aHTha saShas[]
44b2('dul ba): pa dge slong gis chos gos sa la gzhag ste/na mkha' la skya reng 'char bar bgyid dam/chos gos na mkha' la gzhag ste/sa la skya reng 'char bar bgyid na chos gros dang bral bar zhes kyi
44b3('dul ba): 'am/chos gos dang ma bral bral ba zhes bgyi lags/bko' stsal pa/chos gos dang bral ba zhes bya'o//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis chos gos mtshams kyi nang du gzhag ste/mtshams
44b4('dul ba): kyi slad rol tu skya reng 'char bar bgyid dam chos gos mtshams kyi slad tu bzhag ste/mtshams kyi nang du skya rang 'char bar bgyid na/chos gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi 'am/chos gos dang ma
44b5('dul ba): bral ba zhes bgyi lags/bka' stsal pa/chos gos dang bral ba zhes bya'o//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis mtshams mnan tam/mtshams bzung nas/mtshams su 'greng ngam mchis
44b6('dul ba): te/mtshams kyi bar du chos gos gzhag nas skya reng 'char bar bgyid na chos gos dang bral ba zhes bgyid 'am/chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes bgyi lags/bka' stsal pa/chos gos dang ma bral
44b7('dul ba): ba zhes bya'o//btsun pa dge slong yang mtshamos kyi nang na mchis la/chos gos kyang mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa las/chos gos de dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/nye bar 'kho
44b8('dul ba): yod do//mtshams gcad par bya ba chos gos dang mi bral ba'i sdom pa ma byin na'o//btsun pa re shig mtshams ma gcad pa'i gnas su gang tshun chad dge slong chos gos dang bral ba zhes
45a1('dul ba): brgyu/nye bar 'khar d+hi tsam/gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor chag khung sa 'am/sgo/byams sam/khang phran+da nam/kun dga'ar ba 'am/dge slong gis kun du spad/
45a2('dul ba): pa'am/rab 'am/'greng rib bam/'obs yod pa'o//btsun pa dge slong yang gnas gcig la steng g.yogs kyang gcig pa zhig na mchis la/de nyid na chos gos kyang mchis ni//
45a3('dul ba): chos gos de dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/nye bar 'khor yod de/'di ltar gnas de mu stegs can sna tshogs dang /dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /spyod pa pa dang /kun tu
45a4('dul ba): rgyu rnams sam/spun nor bgos pa rnams kyi yin na'o//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis mtshams kyi slad rol la/mtshams kyi slad rol tu 'du shes pas/skyo reng 'char bar
45a5('dul ba): bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi slad rol tu 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso//mtshams kyi slad
45a6('dul ba): rol la mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags ltung ba med do//mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags ltung ba med do//btsun pa re shig
45a7('dul ba): dge slong gis mtshams kyi nang du chos gos bzhag ste/mtshams kyi slad rol tu skya reng 'char bar bgyid pa las/mtshan gyur te/dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i
45b1('dul ba): ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong ma zhig gos/mtshams kyi nang du chos gos bzhag la/mtshams kyi slad rol tu skya dang 'char bar bgyid pa las mtshan gyur te/dge slong
45b2('dul ba): du rung na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyu ro//btsun pa dge slong gis gang gi mdun du chos gros byin gyis brlad par bgyid//nye bar 'khor dge slong gis ni/dge slong gi mdun
45b3('dul ba): du chos gos byin gyis brlab par bya'o//btsun pa dge slong mas gang gis mdun du chos gos byin gyis brlab par bgyi//nye bar 'khor dge slong mas ni dge slong ma'i mdun du chos gos byin
45b4('dul ba): gyis brlab par bya ste/dbyung ba dang rung bar bya ba yang de bzhin du bya'o//btsun pa re shig bslab pa sprul pa chos gos ma mchis par mtshams kyi slang rol tu skya reng 'char bar bgyid na ra
45b5('dul ba): 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur te/de bzhin du dge slong ma la ni chos gos lngas spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slob ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul ma rnams la ni
45b6('dul ba): nyes pa med do//sbyar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te snga ma bzhin no//sdom la/sems 'khrugs pa dang dus las 'das//de bzhin rung ba nyid dang ni//mi rung ba dang gding
45b7('dul ba): ba dang //tshad dang bzhi tshe ni dag dang mtshan//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong chos gos zin pas chos
46a1('dul ba): gos sra brkyang phyung nas//dus ma yin pa'i gos rnyed pa 'dod na/dge slong des chos gas da blang bar bya'o//blangs nas gal te langs na myur ba kho nar chos gosu byas
46a2('dul ba): bcang bar bya'o//gal te mi langs le kha ma langs pa bskong ba'i gos la re ba yod na yang /dge slong des chos gos de zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par bya'o//de la 'das par 'jog
46a3('dul ba): na//spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/btsun pa re shig dge slong gis chos gos shig rnyed ma thag tu sems 'khrugs par gyur na gang nas bzung ste
46a4('dul ba): de'i zla ba bgrang bar bgyi/gang nas bzung ste/rang gi sems phyir rnyed pa nas so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/dge slong gis zla ba gcig gi bar du chos gos gzhag par bya'o//
46a5('dul ba): zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/btsun pa dge slong gis namo 'tsho'i bar du chos gos gzhag kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/nye bar 'khor yod de/zla ba gcig chu
46a6('dul ba): tshad du dus byas na'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis chos gos zla ba gcig gi bar dug zhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa chos gos de ji lta bu zhig
46a7('dul ba): lag so bdun po dag las btags pa gang yang chu bangs rje su gnang zhing ma bkag pa gang yin pa'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/
46b1('dul ba): slong gos chos gos zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par byar nas gsus pa gang lags pa/btsun pa dge slong gis dgung zla gcig la sna lhag par gzhag kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur/
46b2('dul ba): bi mchis lags sam+b+ha/nye bar 'khor yod de/de 'di ltar tshe stegs kyi spyan rung bar gyur lo//rgyu mi rung bar gyur pa dang /spun mi par gyur la/rgyu rung par gyur pa dang /
46b3('dul ba): mi rung bar gyur pa ste/mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang ba lung gi spu dang /ridags kyi bal dang /rabal dang /'dres pa dang /thug sum btegs pa te/de ltar ngu'i chos gos ni zla ba gcig
46b4('dul ba): lhag zer gzhig kyang nyes byas su 'gyur ro//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/dge slong gis chos gos de zlab gcig gi bar du gzhig par bya'o//zhes gsungs pa
46b5('dul ba): gang lags grwa btsun pa dge slong gis dgung zla drug tu chos gos bzhag kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam//nye bar 'khor yod do//chos gos de rnyed nas/zhag sum
46b6('dul ba): cu len pa dang /dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting bar gyur na'o//btsun pa pa tsam ldan 'das kyis/chos gos gsum du ma tshung na zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag go zhes gsungs
46b7('dul ba): pa gang lags pa/btsun pa dge slong gang chos gos gsum tshang bar gyur pa des chos gos mi langs pa zhig rnyed na/des kyang dadung zla gcig gi bar du gzhag par bgyi lags sam/nye bar
47a1('dul ba): /'khor ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nye bar 'khor chos gos gsum tshang na/chos gos gzhan rnyed pa gang yin pa ni langs kyang rung mi langs kyang rung ste/de thams cad ni/
47a2('dul ba): zhag bcu pa yin no//chos gos gsum du ma tshang ba las gal te chos gos su langs pa zhig rnyed na/de yang zhag bcu pa yin no//'on te ma langs pa zhig rnyed na zla ba gcig gi bar du
47a3('dul ba): gzhag par bya'o//de las 'das par gzhag na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dgung zla gcig la gcig tu 'du shes pas/skya reng 'chang bar
47a4('dul ba): bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dgung zla gcig la dgung zla gcig ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ltung ba med do//dgung zla gcig ma
47a5('dul ba): lags pa la/dgung zla gcig tu 'du she so na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so//dgung zla gcig ma lags pa la dgung zla gcig ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags//
47a6('dul ba): ltung ba med do//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis chos gos rnyed nas/dgung zla gcig lags pa las mtshan gyur te/dge slong mar red nas dgung zla gcig las 'da' bar bgyid na cir
47a7('dul ba): 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun par shig bslab pa stsal pas/chos gos dgung zla gcig pas ring du gzhag na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun
47b1('dul ba): pa re shig dge slong mas chos gos dgung zla gcig pas ring du gzhag na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byedadu 'gyu ro//dge slong ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul mas chos gos dgung zla gcig gi bar du gzhag na
47b2('dul ba): cir 'gyur lags/ltung ba med do//sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te snga ma bzhin no//sdom la/pho nya yi ge lag brda dang //gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang //smon ma dang ni sems
47b3('dul ba): 'khrugs dang //tshor ba 'o na ma glen ma dang /khyim pa mo la sogs pa ste//bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
47b4('dul ba): kyis yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la/chos gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jug gam/'chad du 'jug gam 'chag tu 'jug na/spang ba'i ltung byed do//zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/btsun pa re shig
47b5('dul ba): dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la pho nya las gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na/cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//de bzhin du yi ge dang log brda dang //gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang //brgyud de dag
47b6('dul ba): slong ma nye du ma lags pa la/chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na/cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa sgron ma la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol
47b7('dul ba): na cir 'gyur lags//nyes bya'o//de bzhin du dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa/sems 'khrugs pa dang /tshor bas nyams thag pa dang /'on ma dang glen ma la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas
48a1('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong gis khyim pa mo nya du ma lags pa la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//de bzhin du dge slong ma tha dad du gnas pa
48a2('dul ba): dang /dge slong mkhas len pa dang /ma ning mo dang /dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /ma 'gums pa dang /kha 'gums pa dang /dgra bcom pa 'gums pa dang /mu stegs can dang /mu stegs can zhug pa dang / thang su ga na dang /
48a3('dul ba): yo du gnas pa dang /dbang po mi mthun pa can dang /sngar ltung ba byung ba/nye du ma lags pa la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma li//
48a4('dul ba): nye du ma lags pa dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyi khrag 'byin pa dang /bslab pa stsal pa'i dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsal/
48a5('dul ba): na cir 'gyur/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//sdom la/bsgrub par bya dang bkrus pa dang //dge 'dun gyi dang mtshan gnyis dang /mi rung ba dang spangs pa dang //gzhan gyi dang ni gyon pa dang //
48a6('dul ba): ba ni tshan dag tu byas pa dang //dge slong ma ni tha ma yin//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nya du ma lags pa la//chos gos rnying pa bsgrub par bgyi ba zhig/'khrur stsol na cir/
48a7('dul ba): 'gyur lags nyes byas so//dge slong ma nye du ma legs pa la chos gos rnying pa bkrus pa zhig 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong
48b1('dul ba): mnye du ma lags pa la dge 'dun gyi chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsal na cir 'gyur lags/gal te gang zag gir yongs su spyad pas yongasu spyad de//dri ma can du 'gyur ba zhig na/nyes byas
48b2('dul ba): 'gyur ro//'on te gnas mal gyi dngos po zhig 'khrur bcug na ni ltung ba med do//btsun pa re shig dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la/chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsal pa lnga/mtshan gyur te/
48b3('dul ba): dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis nye du ma lags pa'i dge slong ma la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsal pa las/dge slong ma de'i mtshan gyur te

48b6('dul ba): rnying pa 'khrur stsal kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/nye bar 'khor yod do//'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung bar gyur la/rgyu ma rung bar gyur pa dang /rgyu rung
48b7('dul ba): par gyur la/spun mi rung ba dang /gnyi ga mi rung ba ste/mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang /ba lang gi spu dang /ri dgas kyi bal dang /ra bal dang /'dres pa dang /ma btags pa'o//de lta bu'i chos
49a1('dul ba): gos 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis chos gos rnying pa spang ba zhig dge slong mnye du ma lags pa la 'thung stsal na tsar
49a2('dul ba): 'gyur lags/gal te ma spangs pa zhig 'khrur 'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//'on te spangs pa zhig 'khrur 'jug na nyes byasu 'gyuraro//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge
49a3('dul ba): slong ma nye du ma lags pa la gzhan gyi chos gos rnying pa 'khrur sprol na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa dge slong gis gos rung ba dang /grong du 'jug la spang ba dang /'byung
49a4('dul ba): lhalta mchis lags sam/nye bar 'khor yod de/'di ltar dge slong khyim du zhugs pa'i chos gos po shang ba 'am/gci ba 'am/'dam rdzab byam/ldan ljin nam/mi gtsang ba
49a5('dul ba): gzhan gyis 'babs par gyur na'o//des de dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//beskyen par ma rdzogs par 'khrur
49a6('dul ba): stsol ba'i sbyor ba bgyis la/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par lags par bgyid na cir gyur lags/nyes byaso//bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la/bsnyen par rdzogs
49a7('dul ba): kar lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyi la/bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso///
49b1('dul ba): bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyid la/bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags//nyes byas so//brnyan par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la//bsnyen

49b3('dul ba): bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags
49b4('dul ba): nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la/bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes pas/chos gos rnyeng pa 'khrur stsol
49b5('dul ba): nun cir 'gyur legs/spang ba'i 'du byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/nyes bya'o///
49b6('dul ba): nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so//nye du ma lags par bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la/bsnyen por
49b7('dul ba): rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du lags pa la/nye du ma lags par 'du shes pas//chos gos
50a1('dul ba): rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong ma nyi du ma lags pa la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ltung ba med/
50a2('dul ba): dge slong ma nyi du la nye du ma legs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//dge slong ma nye du lags pa la/nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags ltung ba med do//btsun pa
50a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis/yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/dge slong
50a4('dul ba): ma dang /dge tshul ma dang /khyim pa mo dang /gzhan mu ste gas can dang /dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang spyod pa ba da kun tu r+g+haM rnams la 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags//nyes
50a5('dul ba): byas so//de bzhin du 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa la 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur la gos nyes byas so//dge slong mas dge slong dang dge tshul dang /gzhan mu stegs can dang /dge
50a6('dul ba): sgyosbyo dang /bram ze dang /spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu dang /'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa rnams la/'khrur stsolu na cir 'gyur legs/nyes byas so//khyim pa dang /khyim pa mo la
50a7('dul ba): 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyu lags/nyes byis so//dge slob ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul me la ni nyes byas//sngang ltung babyung po la sogs po la ni nyes byas te/sngam pan/
50b1('dul ba): no/de bzhin du 'tshed pa dang /'chag pa la yang rgyas par brjod par bya'o//sdom la/pho nya yi ge lag brda dang //gzhan la skad 'dogs brgyud pa dang //skyon ma dang ni sems
50b2('dul ba): 'khrugs dang //tshor ba 'on ma glen ma dang //gnyis log ra ro rab myos dang //snyoms zhugs de bzhin 'gro ba dang //khas len 'dod pa la spyog snga pa//bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o//
50b3('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang /dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa las/chos gos len na
50b4('dul ba): brje ba ma gtogs te/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la/pho nya las chos gos slong na cir 'gyur
50b5('dul ba): lags nyes byas so//chos gos 'thob na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas kho na'o//de bzhin du yi ge dang /lag brda dang /gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang /brgyud pas nye du ma lags
50b6('dul ba): pa'i dge slong mya de la chos gos len na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa sgron ma la chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags//
50b7('dul ba): nyes byas//chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas kho na'o//de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang /tshor bas nyams thag pa dang /glen ma dang /'on ma dang /gnyid log pa dang /
51a1('dul ba): phyag las khom pa dang /rab tu myos pa dang /snyoms par zhugs pa dang /'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa dang /tha dad du gnas pa dang //khas len pa dang /ma ning
51a2('dul ba): ma dang /dge slong ma sun phyung ba nas/rgyas par dang po mi mthun pa can gyi bar la chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so//chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas kho na
51a3('dul ba): btsun parare shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa/dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa dang /dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa/de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa
51a4('dul ba): dang /bslab pa stsal pa la chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso//chos gos thob nA cir 'gyur lags/sbyang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyu ro//sdom la mi rung ba dang bzhi tshon ni//
51a5('dul ba): gnyis dang de bzhin mtshan dang ni//dge slong dag ni dge slong ma//tshe mo su yang dag bshad pa yin//btsun par shig dge slong gos dge slong na nye du ma legs pa las/chos gos
51a6('dul ba): blangs kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/nye bar 'khor yod de/'di ltar chos gos de'i spyan rung bar gyur la/rgyu mi rung ba dang /spun mi rung bar gyur pa la rgyu
51a7('dul ba): rung ba dang /gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur pa ste/mi rung ba ni rngabal dang /ba lang gi spu dang/ri dgas kyi ba la dang /rang lo dang 'dres pa dang ma btags pa'o//de lta bu'i chos gos shi
51b1('dul ba): blangs na cir 'gyur lags nyes byaso//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis/dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la nye du ma lags par 'du shes pas chos gos lon na cir 'gyur lags//sla
51b2('dul ba): ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong ma nye du ma logs pa la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ltung ba med do//dge slong ma nye du la nye du ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur
51b3('dul ba): lags/nyes byas so//dge slong ma nye du ma la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ltung ba med do//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par
51b4('dul ba): rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes pas//chos gos blangs na cir 'gyur la gas/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bsnyen
51b5('dul ba): bar ma rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags//nyes byas so//nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso///
51b6('dul ba): nye du na lags par bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso//btsun pa re shig bsnyen par ma rdzogs par dge slong ma nye du ma
51b7('dul ba): lags pa la chos gos blangs nas bstan par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso//bstan por ma rdzogs par blangs la/bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cing
52a1('dul ba): 'gyur lags//nyes byaso//bsnyen par rdzogs kar blas la/bsnyen par rdzogs te grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso//bsten par rdzogs kar blangs//
52a2('dul ba): la/bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lagaso//nyes byas so//bsnyen par rdzogs kar blangs la bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso//bstan par
52a3('dul ba): rdzogs nas blangs la/bsnyen par rdzogs te grub na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//bsnyen par rdzogs nas blangs la/bstan par ma rdzogs par grub na cir
52a4('dul ba): 'gyur lags/nyes byaso//btsun par shig dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa las chos gos len pa las mtshan gyur te/dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags//nyes byaso///
52a5('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la/dge slong las chos gos len pa las mtshan gyur te/dge slong du reng nas blangs na cing 'gyur lags/nyes byas//btsun pa
52a6('dul ba): shig dge slong dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa las//chos gos len pa las dge slong ma de mtshan gyur te/dge slong du rad pa las blangs na cir 'gyur lags//nyes byas so//
52a7('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong ma nye du lags pa'i dge slong las chos gos len pa las dge slong de'i mtshan gyur te/dge slong mar red pa las blangs na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas//
52b1('dul ba): btsun par sh+log bsgrubs pa sprul pas dge sbyong ma ho mya lags pa sa/chos gas lon na ra gyur lags/snang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//btsun pa bcom 'das kyis/yang dge slo
52b2('dul ba): dge slong ma nyid ma smin ba las/chos gos len na pa rjes pa ma gtogs te/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags bo//dge slong ma dang /dge tshul mas len na cir 'gyur lags
52b3('dul ba): nyes byas//dge slong mas dge slong dang /dge tshul las len na cir 'gyur lags//nyes byas so//de bzhin du dge slob ma dang /dge tshul ma las blangs na cir 'gyur lags//nyes byaso//
52b4('dul ba): dge tshul gyis dge slong ma dang /dge slob ma dang /dge tshul ma las chos gos len na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//sngar lhung ba byung ba la sogs pa la nyes byas te/snga ma bzhin no//
52b5('dul ba): sdom la/pho nya yi ge lag brda dang //gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang //smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang //tshar ba 'on pa glen pa dang //gnyid log ra ro rab myos dang /
52b6('dul ba): snyoms zhugs 'gro dang phyi rol pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das le tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong khyim bdag gam/khyim
52b7('dul ba): bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste/chos gos slong na dus ma gtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed do//de la dus ni 'di yin te/dge slong chos gos phrogs sa mo//chos gos nyams sam//
53a1('dul ba): chos gos tshig gum/chos gos khyer ram/chos gos dengs na de la dAn/dus yin no zhes gsungs pa gang lcags bya/btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dza
53a2('dul ba): las khyim bdag gam//khyim bdag gis mchis brang nyi du ma lags pa las chos gos slong na cir 'gyur legasanyes byas so//chos gso thob na cir 'gyur legs/nyes
53a3('dul ba): byas kho naro//de bzhin du yi ge dang lag brda dang /gzhin la smad 'dogs pa dang /brgyud na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge sbyong gis khyim bdag
53a4('dul ba): gama?/khyim bdag gro mchis brang skyon ma las chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas//chos gos thob na cir 'gyur logs nyes byas kho na'o//de bzhin du
53a5('dul ba): khyim bdag gam/khyim bdag gi mchis brang nye du ma lags pa/sems 'khrugs pa dang /tshor bas nyams thag pa dang //'on pa dang glen pa dang /gnyis kyis log pa
53a6('dul ba): dong /phyag las kho mo ba dang /rab tu myos pa dang /snyoms par zhugs pa dang /'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa la chos gos spyod na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas//chos gos
53a7('dul ba): thob na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas kho na'o//'di las phyi rol pa gzhon mu stegs can dang /dge sbyong dang bram ze dang /spyad pa bdang /kun tu rgyu nye du ma logs pa la chon rgo
53b1('dul ba): slo na cir 'gyur lags//nyes byas//nas gos thob na cir 'gyu lags/nyes byas kho na'o//sdom lnga/mi rung ba dang bzhon pa na//gnyis dang de na ma tshan dang na/
53b2('dul ba): za ma ma ning nyid de bzhin//ma nong mo dang dge slong ma//btsun pa shig dge sbyong gis khyim bdag gam/khyim bdag gi mchis brang nye du ma lags pa la/chos gos blangs te rdza
53b3('dul ba): kyang /sbyang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/nye bar 'khor lhod do//'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung bar gyur la/rgyu mi rung ba dang /rgyu rung bar gyur la spun mi rung ba dang /
53b4('dul ba): gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur pa ste/mi rung ba ni rnga mo'i bal dang /ba lang gi spu dang /ri dwags kyi bal dang /rang la dang 'dres pa dang /thags su ma btags po de lta bu ra chos gis shig slong
53b5('dul ba): na spong ba de la nyes byas so//chos gos thob na yang nyes byas kho na'o//btsun pa re shig dge slong gi khyim bdag gam/khyim bdag gi mchis brang nye du ma lags pa la nye du ma lag
53b6('dul ba): bar 'du shes pas chos gos sbyong na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so//chos gros thob na cir 'gyur lags/ldang ba'i ltung phyeng du 'gyur ro//nye du ma lags pa la nye dur 'du shi min cir
53b7('dul ba): 'gyur lags/ltung ba med do//nye du la nye du ma lags par 'du shes na cing 'gyur lags/nye' byas so//chos gos thob ni cir 'gyur lags//nyes byas/na'o//nye
54a1('dul ba): la nye dung 'du shes na car 'gyur lags/ltung ba med do//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis mi'i khyim bdag gam/khyim bdag gi mchis brang la mir 'du shes pa
54a2('dul ba): chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//mi l-i mi ma lags par 'du shes na ci re 'gyur
54a3('dul ba): lags/nyes byas so//chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas kho na'o//mi ma lags pa la mor 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas//chos gos
54a4('dul ba): thob na cir 'gyuraro lags/nyes byas kho na'o//bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa ro bsrungs la/bsnyen par rdzogs par grub na cor 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par ma rdzog
54a5('dul ba): par bslangs la//bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par ma rdzogs par bslangs la/bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur lags
54a6('dul ba): nyes byas so//bstan par rdzogs kar blangs la/bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags//nyes byas so//bsnyen par rdzogs kar blangs la/bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub
54a7('dul ba): na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par rdzogs nas bslangs la/bsnyon par rdzogs te grub na cir 'gyur logs/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyu ro//bsnyen par rjod
54b1('dul ba): nas bslangs la/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes bya'o//btsun pa re shig dge slong khyim bdag gam/khyim bdag gi mchis brang nye du ma lags pa la chos gos
54b2('dul ba): sroslong bu las mtshan gyur te/dge slong mar ge nas grub na nor 'gyur lags ka spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong ma khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi mchis drang
54b3('dul ba): nyid ma lags par chos gos slong ba las mtshan gyur te/dge slong du reng nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis nye du ma lag+sas
54b4('dul ba): 'i khyim bdag la chos gos slong ba la khyim bdag de'i mtshan gyur te/bud meng du ri pa las blangs nA cir 'gyur la gso/dIng ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun par shig da
54b5('dul ba): slong khyim bdag gis mchis brang nye du mo lags pa las ches gos sdang ba las khyim bdag gi mchis brang de'i mtshan gyur te/skyes par ring ba las blangs na cir 'gyu lags
54b6('dul ba): spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//de bzhin du dge slong mA la yang brjod do////bam po lnga pa/btsun pa re shig dge slong gis za ma nye du ma legs pa las chos gos rlo
54b7('dul ba): na cir gyu lags/1/byas so//chos gos thab na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas kho na'o//de bzhin du ma ning dang /ma ning mo nas dge slong //dge tshul gyi ra la drangs ni
55a1('dul ba): cir 'gyur lags//nyes byas so//chos gos tho na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas kho na'o//btsun pa re shig dge slong mas khyim bdag gas/
55a2('dul ba): khyim bdag gis mchis brang nyi du ma lags pa las blangaso na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//chos gos thob no cir 'gyur lags/spangs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge
55a3('dul ba): slong ma la ji lta bar bslab pa byin pa la yang de dang 'dra'o//dge slob ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul ma dang /sdang ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa ni nyes byas te rgyas par brjod
55a4('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lo//tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ches gos phrags sam/chos gos nyams sam/chos
55a5('dul ba): gos tshig gam/chos gos dengs sam/chos gos khyer na/khyim bdag gam/khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song la chos gos blang bar bya'o//gal te de
55a6('dul ba): la bram ze 'am/khyim bdag dad pa zhig gis dus kyiso gos mang po stobs la//'dod na dge slong des nga la gos stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa'i mthar thug pa
55a7('dul ba): blang bar bya'o//de las lhag par len na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa lags pa/snga ma slong ba'i spang ba'i ltung byed ji lta bar stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas
55b1('dul ba): pa la yang de 'dra'o//tha dad du bya ba ci yod ce na/stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcus pa na gnyis te/khyim pa'i stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa dang /
55b2('dul ba): dge slong gi stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa'o//dge slong gis khyim pa'i stong g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa blangs te/khyim pa'i stod g.yogs
55b3('dul ba): smad g.yogs dang bcas pa thob la/lhag par slong na lhag par slong ba de la nyes byas so//thob na spang ba'i ltung byed tu 'gyuraro//dge slong gis dge slong gi stod g.yogs smad
55b4('dul ba): g.yogs dang bcas pa blangs te/dge slong gi stod g.yogs dang /smad g.yogs thob pa las lhag par slong na/lhag par slong ba de la nyes byas so//thob na spang ba'i ltung
55b5('dul ba): byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong gis khyim pa'i snod g.yogs dang /smad g.yogs dang bcas pa blangs te/khyim pa'i stod g.yogs dang /smad g.yogs dang bcas pa thob pas
55b6('dul ba): gal te ma longs par gyur na yang ma slong shig/lhag par gyur na yang ma sbyin cig/dge slong gis khyim pa'i stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa las/lhag par blangs
55b7('dul ba): na nyes byasu 'gyur ro//dge slong gis dge slong gi stod g.yogs dang /smad g.yogs dang bcas pa blangs te/dge slong gis stod g.yogs dang /smad g.yogs dang bcas pa
56a1('dul ba): thos pas gal te mchog par gyur na yang bsnyung bar bya'o//lhag par gyur na yang sbyin no//dge slong gis spyad g.yogs dang skud g.yogs dang bcus pa las lga
56a2('dul ba): pa ma byin na nyes byas 'gyur ro//gzhung lhag ma ni bslab pa'i grizhi snga'o//ji ltar bslab bya'i gzhi 'di la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o//sdom la/pho nye yi ge lag brgya
56a3('dul ba): dang //gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyad pa dang //skyon ma dang ni sems 'khrugs dang //tshor ba 'on pa glen pa dang //gi nyid log re ro rab myos dang //snyoms zhugs 'gro
56a4('dul ba): dang phyi rol du'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lu tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gi phyir/khyim po dag gum
56a5('dul ba): khyim+bi bdag gi chung ma nye du mya yin pas chos gos kyi rin dge stegs nas bdag gis chos kyi rin 'di dag gis chose gas 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la/dge slong ming 'di zhes
56a6('dul ba): bog+h+ri ba 'ongs pa dring /de la chos gros rung ba dus su bsnyen no snyam pa las de na gal te dge slong de la ster ma bstabs par rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig rig ste/bzang po 'di//
56a7('dul ba): pa'i phyir/khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa de'i gan du song nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa bdag gi phyir chos gos kyi rin gang dag spags
56b1('dul ba): pa'i chos gos kyi rin de dag gis/tshe dang ldan pa de dag gis chos gos tha ga pa 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la bdag la chos gos rung ba dus su bskon cig ces smras te/chos gos grub na spang ba'i ltung
56b2('dul ba): byed de zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa//detsun pa re shig dge slong pho nya las khyim bdag gam/khyim bdag gi mchis drab nye du ma lags pa la rnam par rtog pa rig nas chos gos slong na cir
56b3('dul ba): 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas kho na'o//de bzhin du yi ge dang lags brda dang /gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang /brgyud na cir 'gyur/
56b4('dul ba): lags/nyes byaso//btsun pa re shig dge slong khyim bdag gam/khyim bdag gi mchis brang nyi du ma lags pa smyon pa la rnam par rtog pa rig nas chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags//
56b5('dul ba): nyes byas so//chos gos thob na cir 'gyur legs/nyes byas kho na'o//de bzhin du sems 'khrug pa dang /tshor bas nyams thag pa dang /'on pa dang glen pa dang /gnyid log
56b6('dul ba): padang /phyag las khom pa dang /rab tu myos pa dang /snyoms par zhugs pa dang /'di las phyi rol pa gzhan mu stegs can dang /dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /spyod ba pa dang /kun tu
56b7('dul ba): 'gyu rnams la rnam par rtog par rig nas/chos gos slong na cir 'gyur legs/nyes byaso//chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas kho na'o//sdom la/mi rung ba dang /
57a1('dul ba): bzhi tshan gnyis//de bzhin du ni mtshan gyur dang //za ma ma ning mo nyid dang //ma ning dang ni dge slong nyid//btsun pa dge slong gis khyim bdag gam/khyim
57a2('dul ba): bdag gi mchis brang nye du ma lags pa la rnam par rtog pa rig nas/chos gos bslangs nas thob kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis legs som/nye bar 'khor yod//
57a3('dul ba): 'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung bar gyur la//rgya mi rung ba dang /rgyu rung bar gyur la/sman mi rung ba dang /gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur pa ste/mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang /ba lang gi skra dang /ri
57a4('dul ba): dgas kyi bal dang /ra bal dang 'dres pa dang /ma btags pa'o//de lta bu'i chos gos kyi phyir rnam par rtog par rigs nas/chos gos bslangs te thob na cir 'gyur legs
57a5('dul ba): nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong khyim bdag gam/khyim bdag gi mchis brong nye du ma lags pa la/nye du ma lags par 'du shes pas rnam par rtog par
57a6('dul ba): rig nas/chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags//nyes byas so//chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/spangs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//nye du ma lags pa la nye dur 'du shes na
57a7('dul ba): cir 'gyur lags//ltung ba med do//nye du la nye du ma logs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//nye du la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags//ltung ba med do//
57b1('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong ma'i khyim bdag gi mchis brang nye du ma lags pa la/ming 'du shes pas rnam par rtog pa rigs nas/chos gos slong na car 'gyur lags/nyes byas//
57b2('dul ba): rmo shes thob na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//mi la mi lags pa re 'du shes ni cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//mi ma lags pa la mir 'du shes na tsam
57b3('dul ba): 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//mi ma la gos pa la mi ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig bsnyen par rdzogs par rnam par rtog
57b4('dul ba): ngar rig nas bslangs lo bskyed par rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par ma rdzogs par rnam par rtog pa rig nas/blangs la bsnyen par rdzogs kar/
57b5('dul ba): grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas su 'gyuraro//bsnyen par ma rdzogs par rnam par rtog par rig nas bsrungs la bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur legs/nyes byas
57b6('dul ba): bsnyen par rdzogs kar rnam par rtog par rig nas bslangs la/bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par rdzogs kar rnam par rtog pa rigs
57b7('dul ba): nas bslangs la/bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas//bsnyen par rdzogs te rnam par rtog pa rig nas bslangs la bsnyen par rdzogs te grub na cir 'gyur
58a1('dul ba): lags/sbyang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//bsnyen par rdzogs te rnam par rtog pa rag nas bslangs la/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags//nyes
58a2('dul ba): byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong khyim bdog gim/khyim bdag gi mchis brang nye du ma lags pa la rnam par rtog par rig nas/slong ba la mtshan gyur te/dge slong mar rad nas
58a3('dul ba): grub na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong khyim bdag gam/khyim bdag gi mchis brang nye du ma lags pa la rnam par rtog pa rigs
58a4('dul ba): nas slong ba las mtshan gyur te/dge slong du rid nas thob na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong khyim bdag gam/khyim bdag gi mchis
58a5('dul ba): brang nye du ma lags pa la/rnam par rtog pa rig nas slong ba las khyim bdag de'i mtshan gyur te/bud med du reng nas blangs na cir 'gyur lugs/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun/
58a6('dul ba): par shog dge slong khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi mchis brang nye du ma lags pa la rnam par rtog par rig nas slong ba las khyim bdag gis mchis brang de'i mtshan gyur te/skyes par
58a7('dul ba): rig nas blangs na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//de bzhin du dge slong ma la yang sbyar bar bya'o//btsun pa re shig dge slong khyim bdag za ma la rnam par rtog pa
58b1('dul ba): rig nas chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags//nyes byas so//chos gos thob nA cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//de bzhin du ma ning dang /ma ning mo la yang nyes byas so//btsun
58b2('dul ba): pa re shig dge slong gis chos gos ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa'i yo byad rnams kyis phyir rnam par rtog pa rig nas bslangs na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//thob na
58b3('dul ba): cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas kho na'o//btsun pa re shig dge slong dge slong gi slad du dong /dge slong ma dang /dge slob ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul ma'i slad du rnam par rtog pa rig
58b4('dul ba): nas chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags//nyes byas kho na'o//ji ltar dge slong gis rnam par rtog pa rig nas pa spangs pa/spang
58b5('dul ba): ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba de bzhin du bslab pa byin pa dang /dge slong ma la yang spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slob ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul ma dang /sngar ltung ba byung ba
58b6('dul ba): la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te/rgyas par brjod par bya'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das latshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi sa/dge
58b7('dul ba): slong gi phyir khyim bdag dang /khyim bdag gi chung mo nyi du ma yin pas/gos kyi rin so so ba dag spags nas/bdag cag gnyis kyis gos kyi rin so so ba 'di dag gis chos gos 'di/
59a1('dul ba): dang 'di lta bu so so ba nyos la/dge slong mI 'dri zhes bya ba 'ongs pa dang /bdag cag gnyis kyis so so nas de la chos gos rlung ba dus su byaskyon no snyam pa las/
59a2('dul ba): de na gal te dge slong des sngar ma bstabs par rtog pa 'ga' zhig rig ste/bzong po 'don pa'i phyir/khyim bdag dang khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa de dag gi drung du sang nas/'di
59a3('dul ba): skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gis bdag gi phyir chos gos kyi rin so so ba gang dag spags pa'i chos gos kyi rin so so ba de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag chos gos 'di dang 'di lta bu so so
59a4('dul ba): bdag nyos la gnyi ga 'dus te bdag la chos gos rung ba gcig dus su legs par bskon cig ces smras te/chos gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang
59a5('dul ba): lags zhes bya ba ste/gzhung lhag ma ni bslab pa'i gnas 'dis me thas pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du bslab pa'i gnas 'di la yang rgyas par brjod par bya'o//sdom la/pho nya yi ge
59a6('dul ba): lag brda dang //gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang //smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang //tshor ba 'on pa glen pa dang //gnyid log ra ro rab myos dang //snyoms zhugs
59a7('dul ba): 'gro dang phyi rol pa'o//sangs rgyab bcom ldo na 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gi phyir/rgyal po 'am/blon pa chen
59b1('dul ba): po 'am/bram ze 'am/khyim bdag gam//grong rdal gyi mi 'am/yul gyi mi 'am/nor can+da nAm/tshong dpon nam/ded dpon gyis pho nya'i lag du chos bu kyi rin dgu bskur bar gyur la/de na
59b2('dul ba): pho nya de chos gos kyi rin dag khyer nas/dge slong gal ba der song ste phyin nas/dge slong de la 'di skad ces yang 'phags pa mkhyen par mdzod cig/'di lta ste yang khyod la
59b3('dul ba): rgyal po 'am/blon po chen po 'am/bram ze 'am/khyim bdag gi mi/grong rdal gyi mi 'am/yul gyi mo 'am/nor can nam/tshong dpon nam/ded dpon che ge mos chos gos
59b4('dul ba): kyi rin 'di dag bskur gyis/'phags pa thugs brtse ba'i slad du/'di dag bzhes shig ces zer na/dge slong des pho nya de la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa pho nya/dge slong dag ni
59b5('dul ba): chos gos kyi rin dag len du mi rung ste/bdag cag chos gos rung ba dus su rnyed na ni len to zhes brjod par bya'o//gal te pho nyidade/dge slong de la 'di skad ces 'phags pa
59b6('dul ba): rnams kyi zhal ta bgyid pa 'phags pa rnams kyi zhal ta nyams su len pa gang lpags pa 'ga' mchis sam zhes zer na/dge slong chos gos 'dod pas pho nya 'di ni/dge sbyong rnams
59b7('dul ba): kyi zhal ta byed pa ste/'di ni dge slong rnams kyi zhal ha nyams su len pa'o zhes/kun dga'i rab pa 'am/dge bsnyen zhal ta byed pa bstan par bya'o//de nas po nye des
60a1('dul ba): gos kyi rin de dag khyed nas/zhal ta byed pa grwa la ba der 'gro rnying phyin nas zhul ta byed pa la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa zhal ta byed pa shes par gyis shig/
60a2('dul ba): khyod kyis chos gos kyi rin 'di dag gis tshes gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la/dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs pa dang /de la chos gos rung ba dus su skon cig ces brjod
60a3('dul ba): nas/de nas pho nya des zhal ta byed pa de la legs par shin tu yang dag par bskor zhing yang dag par bstan nas dge slong de ga la ba der 'gro zhing phyin nas/dge slong de la 'di
60a4('dul ba): skad ces 'phags pas zhal te bgyid pa bstan pa gang lags pa de la/bdag gis yang dag par bstan lags kyis de'i gan du bzhud cig dang /des khyed la chos gos
60a5('dul ba): rung ba dus su bkon par 'gyur ro zhes zer na/dge slong chos gos 'dod pas zhal ta byed gan du song la/tshe dang ldan pa zhal ta byed pa bdag chos gos 'dod do//
60a6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa zhal tu byed pa bdag chos gos 'dod do zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du bskul bar bya/dran par bya'o//len gnyis lanr-i gsum du bskul zhing dran par
60a7('dul ba): byas na/gal te chos gos de grub na/de lta na lags/gal te ma grub na la ni bzhi len lnga lan drug gi bar du phyogs su cang mi smra bar bsdad par bya'o//lan
60b1('dul ba): bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi bar du phyogs su cang mi smra bar bsdud pa na gal te gos de grub na de lta na legs/gal te ma grub na de'i 'og tu chos gos bsgrub pa'i phyir stsal te/
60b2('dul ba): chos gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//gal te ma grub na phyogs gang na chos gos kyi rin 'ongs pa der bdag 'gro bar bya'o//yang na yid brtan pa'i pho nya las
60b3('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dag gis dge slong che ge mo'i phyir/chos gos kyi rin dag pho nya'i lag tu bskur ba de dag na/dge slong de'i don cir yang ma grub kyis shes par gyis shIg/tshe dang
60b4('dul ba): ldan pa dag gis rang gi nor chung ma gzan cig ces spring par bya ste/de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/btsun pa re shig dge slong chos gos bsgru pa'i slad du/pho
60b5('dul ba): nya las zhal ta bgyid pa lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing chos gos de grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//de bzhin du chos rga sa bsgrub pa'i
60b6('dul ba): slang du/yi ge dang lag brda dang /gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang /brgyud pas zhal ta bgyid pa la/lan bzhi lan lnga la ni drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing chos gos de
60b7('dul ba): grung ni cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong gi chos gos bsgrub pa'i slad du/zhal ta bsgrub pa smyon pa la lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og
61a1('dul ba): tu slong bar bgyid cing chos gos de grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//de bzhin du zhal ta bgyid pa sems 'khrugs pa dang /tshor bas
61a2('dul ba): nyams thag pa dang /glen pa dang 'on pa la/lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing chos gos de grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa
61a3('dul ba): re shig dge slong chos gos bsgrub pa'i slad du/zhal ta bgyid pa gnyid kyis log pa la/lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing /chos gos de grub
61a4('dul ba): na cir 'gyur legs/nyes byas so//de bzhin du chos gos bsgrub pa'i slad du/phyag las khom pa dang /rab tu myos pa dang /snyoms par zhugs pa dang /
61a5('dul ba): 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa dang /'di las phyi rol gzhan mu stegs can dang /dge slong dang /bram ze ma dang /spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu rnams la lan bzhi lan
61a6('dul ba): lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing chos gos de grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//sdom la/mi rung ba dang bzhi tshan dang /de bzhin du ni mtshan dang //
61a7('dul ba): yang /za ma ma ning nyid dang ni/ma ning mo ni tha ma yin/btsun pa re shig dge slong gis/chos gos bsgrub pa'i slad du/lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu spong bar
61b1('dul ba): bgyid cing /chos gos de grub kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lha mchis lags sam/nye bar 'khor yod de/'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung bar gyur la/rgyu mi rung ba dang /sman mi
61b2('dul ba): rung la/rgyu rung ba dang /gnyi ga ma rung bar gyur pa ste/mi rung ba ni rnga bul dang /ba lang gri spu dang /ri dgas kyi bal dang /ra bal dang 'dres pa dang /ma btag sa pa'o//de lta bu'i chos
61b3('dul ba): gos kyi phyir lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing /chos gos grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis chos gos bsgrub pa'i slad
61b4('dul ba): zhal ta bgyid pa mi la mir 'du shes pas lan bzhi lanA lnga lan drug 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing chos gos de grub na cir 'gyur lags/spong ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//mi la mi me lags
61b5('dul ba): par du she na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//mi me lags pa la mir 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//mi ma lags pa l-i mi ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur 'gra
61b6('dul ba): nyes byas//btsun pa re shig bsnyen por ma rdzogs par slong bar bgyid cing /bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par ma rdzogs par
61b7('dul ba): slong bar bgyid cing /bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par ma rdzogs par slong bar bgyid cing /bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur
62a1('dul ba): lpags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par rdzogs kar spong bar bgyid cing /bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso//bsnyen par
62a2('dul ba): rdzogs kar slong bar bgyid cing /bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur lags//nyes byas so//bsnyen par rdzogs nas slong bar bgyid cing /bsnyen par rdzogs nas
