62a3('dul ba): grub na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//bsnyen par rdzogs na slong bar bgyid cing /bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//
62a4('dul ba): btsun+d+ra pa re shig dge slong lanA bzhalan lnga lani drug 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing mtshan gyur te/dge slong mar red nas thob na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun
62a5('dul ba): pa shig dge slong ma lan bzhi lan lnga len drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid pa las mtshan gyur te/dge slong du rnyed nas thob na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//
62a6('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong gis chos gos bsgrub pa'i slad du/zhal ta pa la len pa zhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid pa las zhal ta ba de'i mtshon gyur te/
62a7('dul ba): bud med du 'di nas blangs na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis chos gos bsgrub pa'i slad du zhal ta bgyid pa mo//lan
62b1('dul ba): bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid pa zhal ta bgyis pa mo de'i mtshan gyur te/skyes par rnyed nas blangs na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//de bzhin du dge slong
62b2('dul ba): ma la yang ster bar bya'o//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis chos gros bsgrub pa'i slad du zhol ta bgyid pa za ma la len pa ni lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu sbyong bar bgyid cing /chos gos de grub na
62b3('dul ba): cir 'gyur logs/nyes byas so//de bzhin du ma ning dang /ma ning mo la cir 'gyur lags//nyes byas so//btsun pa ri shig dge slong dge slong gi don dang /dge slong ma dang /dge slong
62b4('dul ba): ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul ma rnams kyi don du chos gos bsgrub pa'i slad du lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing chos gos de grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso//
62b5('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong chos gis la ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa'i yo byad rnams kyi slad du lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//
62b6('dul ba): thob na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas kho na'o//btsun pa re shig bslab pa stsal pas chos gos bsgrub pa'i slad du/lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing /chos go/
62b7('dul ba): de grub na cir 'gyur lags/spong ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong mas chos gos bsgrub pa'i slad du lan bzhi lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing chos gos de grub na cir 'gyur
63a1('dul ba): lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slob ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul ma dang /sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la nyes bya su brjod do//
63a2('dul ba): sdom la/gzhan gyis gzhan gyi 'phro dang ni//khyim pa nyid du mu stegs 'gro//mi rung ba dang mtshan dang ni/bzhi tshan bde gshegs bdun tshan no//sangs rgyas bcom
63a3('dul ba): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang srin bal gyi stan sar pa byed na/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa
63a4('dul ba): gang lags pa/btsun pa re shig dge slong gis gzhan la srin bal gyi stan sar pa bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//gzhan dag gi slad du bgyi du
63a5('dul ba): stsal na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis gzhan la srin bal gyi spyan sar pa bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//gzhan dag
63a6('dul ba): gi slad du bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis gzhan gyi srin ngal gyi stan bgyis pa'i 'phro lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags//
63a7('dul ba): nyes byas so//mdun du khyim pa la bgyid du stsal ni cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slob ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul ma dang /bslab pa stsal
63b1('dul ba): bdang /dang po mi mthun pa can dang /sngar lhung ba byung ba dang rku thabs su gnas pa dang /tha dad du gnas pa dang /gnas par mi bya ba nas khas len pa'i bar la bgyid du stsal na cir gyur//
63b2('dul ba): lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pare shig dge slong gis 'di las phyi rol pa gzhan mu stegs can dang /dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu
63b3('dul ba): rnams la srin bal gyi stan sngar pa bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa rnams la
63b4('dul ba): srin bal gyi snyan sar pa bgyid du stsal na tsor 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis srin bal stan sar pa bgyis kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta
63b5('dul ba): mchis lags sam/nye bar 'khor yod de/'di ltar stan de'i spun rung bar gyur la/rgyu mi rung ba dang /rgya rung bar gyur la/spun mi rung ba dang /gnyi go mi rung ba rnga bal dang /
63b6('dul ba): baM lang gi spu dang /ri dgas kyi bal dang /ra bal dang 'dres pa rnams la bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun dar shig dge slong gis bal lam/sha na 'am
63b7('dul ba): ras bal lam/gso bal dang 'dres pa rnams las bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis srin bal dul ma 'as/kha che'i
64a1('dul ba): dar 'dres pa las bgyid du su la na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//ma btags pa las bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags//
64a2('dul ba): nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong/srin bal gyi stan sar pa bgyid du stsol ba las mtshan gyur te/dge slong mar red nas legs par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags
64a3('dul ba): spang pora'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong ma sran bal myi snyan sar po bgyid du stsol ba las mtshan gyur te/dge slong du red nas lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur
64a4('dul ba): lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis srin bal gyi stan sar pa las/sprin bal du 'du shes pas bgyid du sprul na cir 'gyur
64a5('dul ba): lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//srin bal la srin bal ma lags par 'du shes pas bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/ltung ba med de//srin bral ma
64a6('dul ba): lags pa la srin bal du 'du shes nas bgyid du stsa la na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//srin bal ma lags pa la srin bal ma lags par 'du shes pas bgyid du
64a7('dul ba): stsal na cir 'gyur lags/ltung ba med do//btsun pa re shog dge slong gis bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad kyi stan bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/nyes
64b1('dul ba): byas sa/btsun bstan gyi chad ji tsam lags//nye bar 'khar stan gyi tshad gsum ste/chen po dang /'bring dang /chung ngu'o//de la chen por chad ni khru phyed dang lnga ba'o//chung
64b2('dul ba): du ni khru phyed dang gsum pa'o//de'i bar ma ni 'bring po'o//btsun pa re shig bsnyen par ma rdzogs par stan bgyi bar sbyor ba bgyis la/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par lags par bgyid na ci
64b3('dul ba): 'gyur logs/nyes byas so//bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la/bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par ma rdzogs
64b4('dul ba): par sbyor ba bgyis la/bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la/bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags
64b5('dul ba): par ba bying na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la/bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//
64b6('dul ba): bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la/bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba
64b7('dul ba): bgyis la/bsnyen par mi rdzogs par lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//sdom la/pho nya yig log brda dang /gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa //
65a1('dul ba): smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugasu dang /tshor ba 'on pa glen pa'o//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis pho nya las srin bal gyi stan sbar pa bgyid du
65a2('dul ba): stsol na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//de bzhin du yi ge dang /lag brda dang /gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang /brgud pa dang /smyon pa dang /sems 'khrugs
65a3('dul ba): pa dang /tshor bas nyams thag pa dang /'on pa dang /glen pa la cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//ji ltar dge slong gi sa srin bal gyi sa stan byed du bcug na/spang
65a4('dul ba): ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba de bzhin du/bslab pa byin pa dang /dge slong ma la yang spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slob ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul ma dang /sngar
65a5('dul ba): ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang /dge slong grwa/
65a6('dul ba): lug bal nag po 'ba' shig gi stan sor pa byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa zhes bya ba ste/gzhung lhag ma ni srin bal gyi spang ba'i
65a7('dul ba): ltung byed la ji lta bar bal nag po 'ba' shig pa'i ltung byed lo yang de kha na bzhin du rgyas par brjod do//de la tha dad du bye ba ci yod ce na/bzhi tshan la lug bal nag po 'ba'
65b1('dul ba): shig la/nag po 'bra' shog par 'du shes pas sar ba bgyid du stsol na zhes bzhi chen du bya'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun//
65b2('dul ba): pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/dge slong spyan skur pa byed pas cha gnyis ni lug bal nag pa 'ba' shig las gzhug par bya/gsum pa ni dkar po las/bzhi pa ni mkhob pa la las
65b3('dul ba): gzhug par bya'o//gal te dge slong gis cho gnyis lug bal nag po 'ba' shig las ma bcug gam/gA sumo pa dkar po las/bzhi pa 'khob bal las ma bcug par
65b4('dul ba): stan sar pa byed na/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa zhes bya ba ste/gzhung lhag ma ni srin bal gyi spang ba la ji lta bar cha gnyis kyi spang ba la yang brjod
65b5('dul ba): ngar bya'o//de la tha dad du bye bo ci yod ce na/dge slong gis lug bal dkar po dang /mkhob bal nyung ba la yang nyung bar 'du shes/lug bal nag po 'ba' shig mang ba la
65b6('dul ba): yang meng bar 'du shes stan sar po bgyid du spel na zhes bzhi tshan du brjod par bya'o//gnyi gar yang dge slong ma la ni nyes byas su brjod par bya'o//sdom la//gzhan las
65b7('dul ba): gzhan gyi 'phro dang ni/khyim pa mu stegs can 'gro dang //mi rung ba dang mtshan dang ni//bzhi tshan bde gshegs bdun chen no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das le/tshe dang ldan pa nye
66a1('dul ba): /bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong stan sar pa byed pas mi 'dod bzhin du la drug tu bcang bar bya'o//gal te dge
66a2('dul ba): slong gis lo drug tshun chad du stan rnying pa de srad kyang rung /ma spangs kyang rung /stan sar pa gzhan byed na dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes
66a3('dul ba): gsungs pa gang lags pa/btsun pa re shig dge slong gis gzhan la stan sar pa bgyid du sprul na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//gzhan gyi slad du spyan
66a4('dul ba): sar pa bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis gzhan gyi stan 'phro lags par bgyid ni cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//
66a5('dul ba): mdun du khyim pa la stan sar pa bgyid du stsol na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//de bzhin du dge slob ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul mo rnams
66a6('dul ba): dang /bslobs pa stsol pa dang /dang po mi 'thun pa can dang /sngar ltung ba byung ba dang /rku thabs su gnas pa dang /tha dad du gnas pa dang /gnas par mi bya ba nas khas/
66a7('dul ba): len pa'i bar la stan sar pa bgyid du stsol na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis 'di las phyi rol pa gzhan mu stegs can dang /
66b1('dul ba): dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /spyod pa pa la stanA sar pa bgyod du stsol na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong glos 'gro ba gzhan du
66b2('dul ba): gnasong dag la stan sar pa bgyid du sbrel na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis lo drug tshun chad du/stan sar pa bgyid du stsal kyang spang ba'i
66b3('dul ba): ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis logs sam/nye bar 'khor yod do//'di ltar stan de'i spun rung bar gyur la/rgyu mi rung ba dang /rgyu rung ba la sngun mi rung ba dang /gnyi ga mi
66b4('dul ba): rung bar gyur na'o//mi rung ba rnga bal dang /ba lang gi spu dang /ri dgas kyi bal dang /ra bal dang 'dres pa las bgyide du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun
66b5('dul ba): pa re shig dge slong dgung lo drug tshun chad ngu stan sar pa dgying du stsol ba las mtshan gyur te/dge slong mar red nas leg par bgyis na ce re 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//
66b6('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong ma dgung lo drug tshun chad stan sar po dgying du stsol pa las mtshan gyur te/dge slong du red nA sa lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags//spang ba'i
66b7('dul ba): ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dpung po drug yon pa la yin par 'du shes pas su nas bang gying du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/ltung ba med do//lon pa la ma lon
67a1('dul ba): par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//ma lon pa la lon par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ltung ba medo//me lon pa la ma lon par 'du shes na/
67a2('dul ba): cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dgung lo drug tshun tshad du bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad kyi stan sar pa bgyid du stsal
67a3('dul ba): na cir 'gyur lags//nyes byas so//btsun pa bsnyen par ma rdzogs par dkung lo drug tshun chad du stan sar pa bgyi bar sbyor ba bgyis la/bsnyen par ma rmo khar la lnga bgyid na cir
67a4('dul ba): 'gyur legs/nyes byas so//zhes bdun tshan rgyas par brjod par bya'o//sdom la/pho nya yi ge lag brda dang //gzhan lnga snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang //smyon pa
67a5('dul ba): dang ni sems 'khrugs dang //tshor ba 'on pa glan pa dang //btsun pa re shog dge slong gis dgung lo drug tshun chad du pho nya las stan sar pa bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags
67a6('dul ba): nyes byas so//de bzhin du yi ge dang lag brda dang /gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang /brgyud pa dang /smyon pa dang /sems 'khrugs pa dang /tshor bas nyams thag pa dang /
67a7('dul ba): glen pa dang /'on pa la stan sar pa bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//ji ltar dge slong gis lo drug tshun chad du stan sar pa byas na/spang ba'i lgang byed
67b1('dul ba): du 'gyur ba de bzhin du/bslab pa byin pa la yang spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong ma la ni nyes byaso//dge slob ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul ma dang /sngar lhung ba/
67b2('dul ba): byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas su brjod par bya'o//sdom lo//gzhan las gzhan gyi 'phro dang ni//khyim pa mu stegs 'gro ba dang //mi rung ba dang mtshan dang nI//de bzhi
67b3('dul ba): bzhi tshan bdun tshan no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das le/tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis//dge slong gding ba sar pa byed pas/sa
67b4('dul ba): pa kha dog mi sdig par bya ba'i phyir/gdong pa rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor bas glan par bya'o//gal te dge slong gis kha dog sar pa mi sdug par bya ba'i phyiraro/gding ba
67b5('dul ba): rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor bas ma klan pa ga dring ba sar pa spyod na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/btsun pa re shig dge slong
67b6('dul ba): gis bde bar gshegs pa'i mthor sor gcig gam/sor phyed kyis mi 'tshal bar gzhan zhig las gding ba sar pa bgyid du stsol cing spyod na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//gzhan
67b7('dul ba): gyi slad du gding ba sar pa bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//gzhan gyi 'phro lags par bgyid ste skyod na tsar 'gyur logs/nyes byaso//mdun du khyim pa la gding
68a1('dul ba): /bas ba 'byung gyu cing spyod na cog gyur lagan/sbyang ba'o lung byung dum+bA ra//de bzhin du dge slob ma dang /dge tshul dang /dag
68a2('dul ba): tshul ma dang /bslab pastsal pa dang /dang po mi ma thun pa can dang /snga ltung ba byung ba dang /chu tha~Mng su gnas pa dang /thadad du gnas pa dang /granas par mi bya ba nas/
68a3('dul ba): khas len pa'i bang gding ba sar pa bgyid du stsol cing spyod na cir 'gyur legs/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis 'di las phyi rol pa gzhan
68a4('dul ba): mu sngags can dang /dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgya la gding dri sor ba byed du stsol cing spyod na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed
68a5('dul ba): ra ro//'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa rnam snrel dadong bas ba kyi ts+tsha lan cir 'gyur lag so//nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis bde bar
68a6('dul ba): gshegs pa'i mtho cig gsu/rdor byed kyis mi 'tshal bar gding ba sar pa bgyid du stsol cing spyod kyang spang po'i ltung byed du mo 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/
68a7('dul ba): ra 'khor 'od de/'di ltar gding ba sar ba de'i sbun rung bar gyur/rgyu mi rung ba dang /spun mi rung por gyur pa la rgyu rlung ba dang /gnyig mi rung bar gyur na'o//
68b1('dul ba): mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang /ba lang gi spu dang /ri dgas kyi bal dang /ra bal dang 'dres pa dang /ma btags pa ste/de lta bu'i gding ba sar pa byed du 'jug cing spyod na nyes byas su
68b2('dul ba): 'gyur ro//'dul ba gzhung bla ma///bam po drug pa/btsun pa re shig dge slong bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho sor cig gA ma/sor phyed kyis mi 'tshal bar
68b3('dul ba): gding ba sar pa bgyid du sgrol ba lngas mtshan gyur te/dge slong mar red nas spyod na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong ma bde bar gshegs
68b4('dul ba): pa'i mthor sor gcig gam//sor phyed kyis mi 'tshal bar gding ba sa rab bgyid du stsol ba las mtshan gyur te/dge slong du red nas spyod na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed
68b5('dul ba): du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis/bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang du mi 'tshal bra la mi 'tshal bar 'du shes pas glan te gding ba sar pa spyad na cir 'gyur
68b6('dul ba): lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//mi 'tshal ba la lhag par 'du shes pa glan te/spyad na cir 'gyur lags/ltung ba med do//lhag pa la mi 'tshal bar
68b7('dul ba): 'du shes pas glan te spyod na cir 'byung lags//nyes byas so//lhag pa la lhag par 'du shes pas glan te spyad na cir 'gyur lags/ltung ba med do//btsun pa re shig
69a1('dul ba): bston par rdzogs par 'do bar gshogs pa'i mabyung song gcig gas/sor pyod kyi mo'i tshul par gdong bsar pa 'byed du phul ba'o sbyo ba
69a2('dul ba): dbyis pa/bsnyen par rdzogs byer bgyis na ci kur lagasanyes byas so//bsnyen par rdzogs por sbyor ba bgyis la drasten par rdzogs kar legs par gyi
69a3('dul ba): cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen dar mi rdzogs par sbyor po bgyis la/bsnyen par rdzogs nas legs par bgyi sbyin cing 'gyur lags/nyes byab /
69a4('dul ba): bsnyen par rdzogs kar skyo dang bgyis labarten par rdzogs kar lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/nyes bya'o//bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bamyos pa
69a5('dul ba): sbyin par rdzogs nas lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lagasanyes byas so//bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor du bgyis la/snyen par rdzogs nas legs par bgyis
69a6('dul ba): ni cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//bsnyen par rdzogs nas skyeng ba bgyis la/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur
69a7('dul ba): lags/nyes byas so//sdom /pho nya yi ge 'ag berda dang //gzhon la skad 'dogs brgyud pa dang //smon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang /
69b1('dul ba): 'byon pa glen pa'o//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis bde bar gshegs pa'i mthor sor gcig gam/sor phyed kyis mi 'tshal bar pho nya las gding ba sar pa gyod du stsal cing
69b2('dul ba): spyod na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//de bzhin du yi ge dang /lag brda dang //gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang /brgyud pa dang /smyon pa dang /sems 'khrugs pa dang
69b3('dul ba): tshor bas nyams dag pa dang /glen pa dang /'on pa la gding ba saraR+sha pa bgyid du stsol cing spyod na cir 'gyur legs/nyes byas//ji ltar dge slong gis gding ba sar pa byed du
69b4('dul ba): 'jug cing spyod na/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba ltar bslab pa byin pa la yang de dang 'dra'o//dge slong ma ni byed du 'jug cing /spyod na nyes byas so//dge slong mi dang
69b5('dul ba): dge tshul dang /dge tshul ma dang /sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas so//sdom la/nam mkha' rdzu 'phrul sprul pa dang //de bzhin sngags rnams gzhan
69b6('dul ba): gsum dang //mi rung gnyis chen tshan dang ni//bzhi tshan pa ni tha ma yin//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das le tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa//btsun pa
69b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lam du zhugs pas/lug bal dag snyed la 'dod na//dge slong des blang bar bya'o//blangs nas khyer ba med na dpag tshad gsum gyi mtha'i 'aradu
70a1('dul ba): bdag nyid kyis bkur bar bya'o//de las 'das par khyer na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/btsun pa re shig dge
70a2('dul ba): skyong gis dpag tshad gsum las 'das par nam mkho' las lug bal 'tshal ni cir 'gyur lags/rdzu 'phrul gyis khyer na ltung ba med do//'on te rnam pa gzha
70a3('dul ba): gyis khyer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro//rung ba bgyid pa sbrul las dpag tshad gsum las 'das par 'tshal ni cir 'gyur lags//nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis
70a4('dul ba): gsang sngags sam//sman gyis bdag nyid mi gda' bar bgyis te/dpag tshad gsum las 'das par lug bal 'tshal na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//gzhan gyi
70a5('dul ba): slang du dpag tshad gsum las 'das par lug bal 'tshal na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//gzhan las dpag tshad gsum las 'das par lug bal bkur na cir 'gyur
70a6('dul ba): lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dpag med gsum las 'das pas lug nga la 'tshal kyang spad de'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/
70a7('dul ba): nye bar 'khor yod de/'di ltar dge slong lam du zhugs pa zhig rnaMs yug zhal dag rnyed nas//des de dag dpag tshad gsum gyi bor dung dag nyid kyis khyer ba las/des yang
70b1('dul ba): lug bal gzhan zhig skyed nas//des snga ma bor te phyi ma khyer nas 'gro na ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis lug bal ma togs pa des las gzhan mi rung ba rda bal dang /bA la
70b2('dul ba): gi sgra dang /ri dgas kyi bal dang /rang ye dang 'dres par dpag tshad gsum las 'das par 'tshal na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bdun pa re shig dge slong gis
70b3('dul ba): lug brel dpag tshad gsum las 'das par 'tshal ba las mtshan gyur te/dge slong mar red nas/mtshams las 'das na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun
70b4('dul ba): pa re shig dge slong mas lug 'al dpag tshad gsumya las 'das par 'tshal ba las mtshan gyur te/dge slong du red nas mtshams las 'das na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i
70b5('dul ba): ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun par shig dge slong gis lug bal dpag tshad gsum las 'das pa na/rgyang grags la rgyang grags su 'du shes pas 'tshal na cir 'gyur
70b6('dul ba): lags/spang ba'i ltung bad du 'gyur ro//rgyung grags la rgyang grags ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lagaso//nyes byas so//rgyang grags ma lags pa
70b7('dul ba): la rgyang khrag su 'du shes ni cing 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//rgyang grags ma lags pa la rgyang grags ma lags par 'du shes na cing 'byor lags/nyes byas so//
71a1('dul ba): sdom la pho ny+dza yi ge lag brda dang //gzhan pa la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang //smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang /tshor ba 'on pa
71a2('dul ba): glen pa'o//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis lug bal dpag tshad gsum las 'das par pho nya la sa bskur na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//de bzhin du yi ge//
71a3('dul ba): dang lag brda dang /gzhan la snyad 'degs pa dang /brgyud pa dang /smyon pa dang /sems 'khrugs pa dang /tshor bas nyams thag pa dang /glen pa dang 'on pa la dpag
71a4('dul ba): tshad gsum las 'das par lug bal bskur na cir 'gyur legs/nyes byas so//ji ltar dge slong gis lug bal dpag tshang gsum las 'das par khyer na spang ba'i
71a5('dul ba): ltung byed du 'gyur ba de bzhin du bslab pa byin pa la yang spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong ma dang /dge slob ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul ma dang /snga ltung ba
71a6('dul ba): byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byaso//sdom la/pho nya yi ge lag brda dang /gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang /smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs
71a7('dul ba): dang /tshor ba 'on pa glen pa'o//khyim pa dag la sogs pa ste/bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa nye bar
71b1('dul ba): 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang /dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la/lug bal khrur 'jug gam/'tshed du 'jug gam/
71b2('dul ba): rmed du 'jug ni spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/btsun pa re shig dge slong gi pho nya las/dge slong ma nye du ma legs pa la
71b3('dul ba): lug bal 'khrur stsol na ci ri 'gyur legs/nyes byas so//de bzhin du yi ge dang /lag brda dang /gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang /bergyud pas dge slong
71b4('dul ba): mnye du ma lags pa la lug bal 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa skyon ma la
71b5('dul ba): lug bal 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//de bzhin du dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa/sems g.yeng ba dang /tshor bas nyams thag pa/
71b6('dul ba): dang /glen ma dang /'o na mra la lug bal 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis khyim mi mo nye du ma lags pa la
71b7('dul ba): lug bal 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur legs/nyes byas so//de bzhin du dge slong khas len pa dang /ma ning dang /dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /ma 'gums
72a1('dul ba): pa dang /pha 'grums pa dang /dgra bcom pa 'gums pa dang /chu stegs can dang /mya ste sa can gasmras pa dang /rgyu thab su gnas spyad/gnas par mi bya ba dang /du dra//
72a2('dul ba): mi mthun pa can la lug ngal 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas sa//btsun par shig dge slong gis dge slong ma dag 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang /de bzhin gshegs
72a3('dul ba): pa la ngani sems kyis khrag 'byin pa dang /tha dad du gnas pa dang /bslab pa stsal pa la lug bal 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur logs/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//
72a4('dul ba): btsun pa re shig bslab pa stsal pos dge slong ma nyedu ma legs pa la lug bal 'khrur stso la na cir 'gyur lags/sbyang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//sdom la/bsgrub bya shas tsam bkrus
72a5('dul ba): pa dang /dge 'dun gyi dang mtshan gnyis dang /mi rung ba spangs pa dang //de bzhin du ni gnyen nyid dang //bzhi mtshan dag tu byas pa dang //dge slong ma ni tha ma yin//btsun pas//
72a6('dul ba): re shig dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la/lug bal bsgrub par bgyi ba zhig 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso//dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la lug bal shas tsam
72a7('dul ba): bkrus pa zhig 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi lug bal 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/gal te gang
72b1('dul ba): gang zag gar yongs su spyad pas yongs su spyad de dri ma can du byas pa dag na nye byas su 'gyur ro//'on tu gnas mal gi dngos po zhig la drur bcug na ni ltung ba med do//btsun pa/
72b2('dul ba): re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la lug bal 'khrur stsol po las mtshan 'gyur te/dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas//btsun pa re shig dge slong
72b3('dul ba): gis dge slong mnye du ma lags pa la lug bal 'khrur spel pa las mtshan gyur te/dge slong du red na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso//btsun po rdo ts+tshas kyis dge slong gis dge slong sa
72b4('dul ba): nye du ma lags pa lA/lug bal 'khrur 'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhes gsungs pa gang legs pa/btsun pa dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la lug pa la
72b5('dul ba): 'khrur stsal kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lce mchis lags som/nye bar 'khor yad de/mi rung ba dang 'dres po 'dur 'jug pa ste/mi rung ba rje ba la dang /ba lang gi su
72b6('dul ba): dang /ri dgas kyi bal dang //robal dang 'dres pa zhig 'khrur bcug na nyes byas su 'chur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis spangs pa'i lug bal 'khrur stso la na cir 'gyur
72b7('dul ba): lags ni gal te ma spangs pa zhig yin na spang ba'i ltung byed du gyur//'on to spangs bzhig yin na ni nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis gzhon gyi lug pa'i zhig
73a1('dul ba): /'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig brnyen par rdzogs par lug ngal 'khrur stsol ba'i sbyor ba bgyis la/bstan par
73a2('dul ba): ma rdzogs par lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur legs/nyes byas so//bsnyen par rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la/bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags por bgyis na cir 'gyur lags
73a3('dul ba): nyes byas so//bsnyen par ma rdzogs pA sbyor ba dgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis
73a4('dul ba): la bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par rdzogs kar spor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyis na cir
73a5('dul ba): 'gyur lags//nyes byaso//bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor bar bgyis la/bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par dgyis nas cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//
73a6('dul ba): bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la/bsnyen par mi rdzogs par lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong gos dge slong ma
73a7('dul ba): nye du ma lags pa la nye du ma lags par 'du shes pas lug bal 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//nya du ma lags pa la nye dur 'du shes na
73b1('dul ba): ci ra 'gyur lags lgang ba med do//nye du ma lnga nye du ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//nye du la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ltung ba med do///
73b2('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes pas lug bal de 'khrung stsol na cir 'gyur lags/
73b3('dul ba): spad ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen sar
73b4('dul ba): ma rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur legs/nyes byaso//bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//dge slong gis nye
73b5('dul ba): du ma lags pa dge slob ma dang /dge tshul dang /khyim pa mo dang /gzhan mu stegs can dang /dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu rnams dang /'gro ba gzhan
73b6('dul ba): du gnas pa rnams la 'khrur stsal na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso//dge slong mas dge slong dang /dge tshul dang /'di la so phyi rol pa gzhan mu stegs can dang /dge sbyong dang /dram
73b7('dul ba): g+ha dang /spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu rnams dang /'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa rnams la 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//khyim pa dang khyim pa mo la 'khrur su lo na cir 'bru
74a1('dul ba): lags/nyes byas so//dge slob ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul ma dang /sngar lhung 'byung ba la sogs pa la nyes byas te/de bzhin du 'tshod pa
74a2('dul ba): dang /rmed pa la yang brjod par bya'o//sdom la/pho nya yi ge lag badz+ra dang //gzhan la snyad 'dogs rgyud pe dpe//skyo ma dang ni sems 'khrugs dang //tshor ba'i na pa 'gro
74a3('dul ba): ba'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/yang dge slong gang rang gi lag gis gsar dang dngul
74a4('dul ba): len tam/len du 'jug na spang ba'i ltung byeng du 'gyur ro//zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/btsun pa re shig dge slong gis pho nya las gser dang dngul lan tu stsal na
74a5('dul ba): cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//dri bzhin du yi ge dang lag brda dang /gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang /brgyud pas gsir dang dngul ldan du stsal na cir 'gyur lags
74a6('dul ba): nyes byas so//btsun po re shig dge slong gis smyon pa gser dang 'angul len du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang //
74a7('dul ba): tshor ngos nyams thag pa dang /glen pa dang 'on pa dang /'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa gser dang dngul len du sA la ni cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso//sdom pa/
74b1('dul ba): lkog dang mtshan dang ma sha dang //bzhi chan bdun tshan dben pa dang /khyim pa la sogs lus dang skang //len dang gzhan gyi dge slong ma//btsun pa dge slong gis gser dal/
74b2('dul ba): blangs kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/nye bor 'khor yod do//lkog gi phyogs nas len du 'jug pa 'am/yo byad gzhan du 'du shes na'o//
74b3('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong gser dang dngul len pa las mtshan gyur te/dge slong mar red ne cir 'gyur lags/sbreng ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur//btsun pa re shAg dge slong ma
74b4('dul ba): gser dang dngul len pa las mtshan gyur te/dge slong du rad na tsar 'gyur legs/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong ma gser gyi ma sha'am//dngu
74b5('dul ba): gyi ma sha len tam/len tu stsol na tsAr 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//ga lai to/khar nga'i ma shra 'am/zangs kyi ma sha lan tam/len tu sprul na cir 'gyur/
74b6('dul ba): lags/nyes byaso//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis gser dang dngul l-i/gsar dang dngul du shes te blangs na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyu ro//gser dang dngu
74b7('dul ba): la gser nga dngul ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ltung ba med do//gser dang dngul ma lags pa la gser dang dngul lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur pags/nyes
75a1('dul ba): /byas so//gsIr dang dngul ma lags pa la gser dang dngul ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/lung ra med do//btsun pa re shig ba
75a2('dul ba): par ma rdzogs par gser dang dngul len pa'i sbyor ba bgyis la/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par blangs ni cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba
75a3('dul ba): bgyis la//bsnyen par rdzogs kar blangs na cir 'gyur lags//nyes byas so//bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs nas blangs na cir 'gyur logs/
75a4('dul ba): nyes byas so//bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs kar blangs na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la//bsnyen/
75a5('dul ba): par rdzogs nas blangs na cir 'gyur lagasanyes byas so//bsnyen par rdzogs nas skor ba bgyis la/bsnyen par rdzogs nas blangs na cir 'gyur logs/spang ba'i ltung
75a6('dul ba): byed du 'gyur ro//bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par blangs na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa re shog dge slong gis dben pa
75a7('dul ba): yi dben par 'du shes pas/gser dang dngulo blangs par sgon cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//dben pa la mi dben par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//
75b1('dul ba): mi dben pa la dben par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//mi dben pa la mi dben par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa
75b2('dul ba): re shig dge slong gis gser dang dngul mngon sum du khyim pa lan tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//de bzhin du za mo dang /ma ning dang /dge slong ma
75b3('dul ba): sun phyung ba dang /ma 'gums pa dang /pha 'gumos pa dang /dgra bcom pa 'gums pa'am/dge 'dun gyi dben bgyis pa'am/de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis
75b4('dul ba): khrug 'byin pa dang /mu stegs can dang /mu stegs can zhugs pa dang /rku thab su gnas pa dang /tha dang du gnas pa dang /gnas par mi bgyi ba dang /khas len pa dang /dang po
75b5('dul ba): mi mthun pa can dang /sngar ltung ba byung ba dang /bslab pa stsal ba gse dang dngul mngon sum du len tu stsa lan cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//'atsun
75b6('dul ba): pa re shig dge slong gis lus kyi rnam par rig byed kyis/gser dang dngul len tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dbus pa'i dge slong gis mtha'
75b7('dul ba): 'khob kyi skad du dbus pa la gser dang dngul lon tu stsal la/dbus pas kyang mtha' 'khob kyi skad de ma 'tshal na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//mtha' 'khob pas
76a1('dul ba): dbus pa'i skud du mtha' 'khob pa la gser dang dngul len tu stsal la/mtha' 'khob pas kyang dbus pa'i skad de ma 'tshal na cir 'gyur
76a2('dul ba): lags/nyes byas so//mtha' 'khob pas mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du/dbus pa la gser dang dngul len du stsal la/dbus pas kyang mtha' 'khob pa'i skad dam
76a3('dul ba): 'tshal na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//dbus pas dbus pa'i slad du mtha' 'khob pa la gser dang dngul len tu stsal la/mthara' 'khob pas kyang dbus pa'i
76a4('dul ba): skad de ma 'tshal na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa dge slong gris rang gi lag gris gser dang dngul len ta ma/lan du sprul kyang ltung byed du mi 'gyur
76a5('dul ba): ba lta mchis legs sam/nye bar 'khor yod de/'di ltar gser dang dngul len pa na/rang gir byed pa'i sems mi skyed cing mi rung ba'i dngos po las//rung ba'i dngos
76a6('dul ba): po gzhan zhig rang rig bya'o//zhes tshig tu smra'o//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis gzhan gyi slad du gser drang dngul len nam/len du stsal na cir 'gyur lags ltung
76a7('dul ba): byed do//btsun pa re shig dge slong mas ga ser dang dngul len tam/len du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig bslab pa stsal pas
76b1('dul ba): rang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len nam/lon du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/stong pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shAg dge slong mus rang gis gser dang dngul lon tam/
76b2('dul ba): len du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//dge tshul dang dge tshul ma la ni ltung po med do//sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas so//sdom la/pho nya yi ge
76b3('dul ba): lag brda dang //gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang //smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang //tshor ba 'on pa 'gro ba'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa nye bar
76b4('dul ba): 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong grang mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed na/spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa
76b5('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong gis pho nya las mngon mtshan can gyis/spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid na cir 'gyur lags nyos byas te//de bzhin du yi ge dang lag brda dang /gzhan
76b6('dul ba): kyigyi slad du dang //gzhan la snyed 'dogs pa dang /brgyud pa la yang brjod par bya'o//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis smon pa dang lhan cig mngon mtshan gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs
76b7('dul ba): bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang /tshor bas nyams theg pa dang /'on pa dang glen pa dang /'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa rnams dang ldan
77a1('dul ba): cig mngon mtshan can gyis spyad pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid na cir 'gyur lags//nyes bya'o//sdom la/mtshan dang bzhi tshan kho na dang //bdun tshan dang ni gzhan
77a2('dul ba): phyir dang //bslab dang nye du 'dra ba dang //dge slong ma ni za ma yin//btsun pa re shig dge slong mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid pa las mtshan gyur te/dge slong
77a3('dul ba): rod nas rnyed pa grub na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun par shig dge slong mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa sna tshogs bgyid pa las mitshon gyur te/dge
77a4('dul ba): slong du rnyed nas rnyid pa grub na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis/mi la mir 'du shes pas mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam
77a5('dul ba): pa sna tshogs bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//mi la mi mi lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so//mi ma lags pa la mir 'du
77a6('dul ba): shes na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//mi ma lags pa la mi ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags//nyes byas/btsun po re shig bsnyen par ma rdzogs par mdze
77a7('dul ba): mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sbyor ba bgyis la/bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par ma rdzogs
77b1('dul ba): sa[]\u0f7fsa sa[]/atha sa ma/Shas[]
77b2('dul ba): par sbyor ba bgyis pa/bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la/bsnyen par rdzogs par
77b3('dul ba): lagaso par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/nyes pas so//bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la/bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags//nyes byas so//
77b4('dul ba): bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la/bsnyen par rdzogs nas legs/par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs nas
77b5('dul ba): lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/sbyang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la basbyin par ma rdzogs par logs par bgyis ni cir 'gyur lags/
77b6('dul ba): nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis gzhan gyi skad bu mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa re shig bslab pa
77b7('dul ba): sprul pa mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa nye du dang lhan cig mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa
77b8('dul ba): rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa ro shig dge slong gis mngon mtshon can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba sgom
78a1('dul ba): /lags sam/nye bar 'khor yod de//'dra bas 'dra ba brjes na ltung ba med do//btsun pa re shig dge slong ma mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs
78a2('dul ba): bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slob ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul ma dang /sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas so//sangs rgyas
78a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang nyo tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed na/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//zhes
78a4('dul ba): gsungs pa gang lags pa zhes bya ba ste//gzhung lhag ma ni mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa la bshad pa ji lta ba de bzhin du nyi tshong 'di la yang rgyas par brjod par bya'o//sdom la/de
78a5('dul ba): nyid nyams dang yul gzhan dang //mu stegs so btang mI dkar dang //smon pa mtshan dong pho nya dang //yod dang 'tshe ba dge slong ma//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa nye
78a6('dul ba): bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/dge slong gis lhung bzed lhag pa zhag bcu'i bar du bcang bar bya'o//de las 'das par 'chang na ltung byed du 'gyur
78a7('dul ba): shes gsungs pa/btsun pa lhung bzed de nyid bcangs na yang ltung bar yang 'gyur la de nyid bcangs na ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/nye bar 'khor yod do//'di ltar dag
78b1('dul ba): slong lhung bzed chen po 'chang ba las mtshon gyur te/dge slong mar red nas bcangs na nyes byas su 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis spang ba'i lhung bzed nyams na/ltung
78b2('dul ba): ba bshegs par bgyi lags sam/nye bar 'khor ba bshags par bya'o//lhung ba bshags nas slar na spang bar bgyi 'am/nye bar 'khor ma yin no//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
78b3('dul ba): kyis/dge slong gis ltung bzed lhag pa zhag bcu'i bar du bcad par bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/btsun pa dge slong gis lhung bzed lhag pa dgung bcu'i bar bas thal bar
78b4('dul ba): bcangs la//'di las ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam//nye bar 'khor yod de/'di ltar dge slong gis yul gzhan nus dge slong zhig la/dge slong gis lag tu ltung bad
78b5('dul ba): cig bskur na/de sA lhung bzed de yun shin tu ring por bcangs kyang ltung ba med do//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis mu stegs can gyi snod bcangs na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso//
78b6('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong gis lhung bzed seso ma btang ba lhag pa bcangs na cir 'gur legs/nyes byas so//btsun pa raM shig dge slong gis lhung bzed skya bo zhig bcings
78b7('dul ba): na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa dge slong gis lhung bzed rnyed ma thag tu sems 'khrugs par 'gyur na/gang nas bzung ste dgung bcur bzang bar bgyi/gang
79a1('dul ba): nas rang gi sems sor chud pa nas so//btsun pa dge slong gis lhung bzed lhag pa dgung bcu las 'das par bcangs kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur
79a2('dul ba): bya lha mchis lags sam/nye bar 'khor yod/'di ltar dge slong gis lhung bzed rnyed nas zhag bcu lon pa dang /mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red nas 'chang na'o//btsun pa dge
79a3('dul ba): slong mas lhung bzed lhag pa dgung gcig lhag par bcangs kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis sam/nye bar 'khor yod de/'di ltar dge slong mas lhung bzed rnyed ma thag
79a4('dul ba): tu mtshan gyur te/dge slong du rad nas/'chang na'o//btsun pa dge slong gos yun shin tu ring mo zhig tu lhung bzed lhag par bcangs na/'di la ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta
79a5('dul ba): mchis lags sam/nye bar 'khor yod de/'di ltar dge slong gis dge slong zhig la lhung bzed kyi phyir dge slong mngags na/de nas lhung bzed de blangs te yun shin tu ring mo
79a6('dul ba): zhig tu bcangs kyang ltung ba med do//btsun pa dge slong la lhung bzed gcig bdog cing mchis la de nyid kyang spang bar 'gyur ba lta mtsho si lags sam/nye bar 'khor yod//
79a7('dul ba): byin gyis ma brlabs par bcangs na'o//btsun pa dge slong gis nam 'tsho'i bar du lhung bzed lhag pa bcad kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/nye bar 'khor yod de//
79b1('dul ba): 'di ltar dge slong zhag bcu tshun cad dus las 'das na'o//btsun pa re shig bslab pa stsal pa lhung bzed lhag pa dgung bcu las 'das par 'chang na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i
79b2('dul ba): ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong ma ni lhung bzed lhag ma zhag tsug las 'das par 'tshong na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//dge slong ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul ma
79b3('dul ba): la ni ltung ba med do//sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas so//sdom la/pho nya yi ge lag brda dang //gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa rgyud pa dang /
79b4('dul ba): smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang //tshor ba 'on pa 'gro ba'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan
79b5('dul ba): 'ongs kyis/yang dge slong gang lhung bzed lhan pa lnga med pa spyod bzod pa yod bzhin du bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir/lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol zhing /lhung bzed grub na
79b6('dul ba): spang ba'i ltung byed do//dge slong des lhung bzed de//dge slong gi 'khor la dbul bar bya zhing dge slong gi 'khor de'i lhung bzed tha mar gyur pa gang yin pa de/dge slong de las
79b7('dul ba): phyis dge slong khyod kyis lhung bzed 'dir byin gyis brlabs par mi bya/btang bar mi bya gzhan la sbyin par mi bya bar chag pa'i mthar thug gi bar du khyad kyis dal bu dal bus
80a1('dul ba): spyad par byar//zhes sbyin par bya ste/de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ba nun par shag dge slong gas pa nya las lhung bzang /
80a2('dul ba): gnyis pa btsal na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas kho na'o//po ny+tsa las ji ltar yi ge dang lag brda dang /gzhan
80a3('dul ba): la smad 'dogs pa dang /brgyud pas lhung bzed gnyis pa ba tsal na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso//lhung bzeng thob na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas kho na'o//btsun pa
80a4('dul ba): re shig dge slong gis smyon pa las lhung bzed gnyis pa tshol na cir 'gyur lags/nyes bya'o//lhung bzed gnyis pa tshel na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas ma
80a5('dul ba): na'o//de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang tshor bas nyan sna thag pa dang /glen pa dang /'on pa dang /'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa rnams las lhung bzed gnyis pa chol
80a6('dul ba): na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur legs/nyes byas kho na'o//sdom la/mu sngags can dang za ma nyid//de bzhin nyid du mtshan da
80a7('dul ba): yang //thun mong dang ni bzhi tshan nyid//yo byad rnams dang dge slong ma/btsun pa re shog dge slong gis 'od las phyi rol ba gzhan mu stegs can dang /dge slong dang bram ze dang /
80b1('dul ba): spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu rnams las lhung bzed gnyis pa tsho la na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas kho na'o//btsun pa re shig dge
80b2('dul ba): slong gis mu stegs can gyi snod bslangs na cir 'gyur lags//nyes byas so//snod thob na cir 'gyur legs/nyes byas kho na'o//'dul ba gzhung bla ma////bam po bdun pa/
80b3('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong gis zi ma las lhung bzed gi nyes pa btsal na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso//lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas kho na'o//de bzhin du ma nang dang /
80b4('dul ba): ma ning mo dang /mtshan gnyis pa las lhung bzed gnyis pa tshol na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso//lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas kho na'o//btsun pa re shig dge slong
80b5('dul ba): gis lhung bzed spyad bzod pa mchis bzhin du/lhung bzed gnyis pa bslangs pa las mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red nas theb na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//
80b6('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong mas lhung bzed spyad bzod pa mchis bzhin du lhung bzed gnyis pa btsal pa las mtshan gyur te/dge slong du red nas thob na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i
80b7('dul ba): ltung byed du 'gyur//btsun po re shig drage slong gris lhung bzed spyad bzod pa mchis bzhin du khyimang bdag mas khyi ma bdag gi mchis drang las/lhung bzed gnyis pa btsal ba
81a1('dul ba): lAs/de gnyis ka mtshan gyur te mtshan gyur nas thob na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i lhung byud du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shIg dge /slong mas lhung
81a2('dul ba): bzed spyad bzod pa mchis bzhin du/khyim bdag gi ma khyim bdag gi mchis brang nya du ma lags pa las/lhung bzod gnyis pa btsal ba las/de gnyis ka'i mtshan gyur
81a3('dul ba): te/mtshan gyur nas thob na cir 'gyur lags/sbyang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//bsnyen par ma rdzogs par spangs la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas
81a4('dul ba): bsnyen par ma rdzogs par bslangs la/bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub ni ner 'gyur lags nyes byas so//bsnyen par ma rdzogs par bslangs la/bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cing
81a5('dul ba): 'gyur lags nyes byas so//bsnyen par ma rdzogs par bslangs la/bsnyen par rdzogs nas grubo na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par rdzogs kar bslangs la
81a6('dul ba): bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par rdzogs kar bslangs lnga/bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//
81a7('dul ba): bsnyen par rdzogs nas blangs la/bsnyen par rdzogs nos grub na cir 'gyur lags/spang sa'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//bsnyen par rdzogs nas blangs la/bsnyen par ma rdzogs
81b1('dul ba): par grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas//btsunA pa re shig dge slong gnyis kyis/lhung bzed gcig blangs na cir 'gyur lagros/nyes byas so//lhung bzed thob na cir
81b2('dul ba): 'gyur legs/nyes byas kho nar//btsun pa re shig dge slong gos mi la mir 'du shes pas/lhung bzed gnyis pa blangs na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//lhung bzed
81b3('dul ba): thob na cir 'gyur lagasau//spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//mi la mi ma lugs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso//lhung bzed thob na cire 'gyur lags/nyes
81b4('dul ba): byas kho na'o//mi ma lags pa la mir 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas kho na'o//mi ma lags pa la mi ma lags
81b5('dul ba): par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lagras/nyes byas so//lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas kho na'o//btsun pa re shig dge slong gis yo byad dag gama?/rin gyis
81b6('dul ba): lhung bzed gnyis pa tshol na cir 'gyur lags//ltung ba med do//btsun pa re shig bslab pa stsol bas/lhung bzed spyad bzod pa mchis bzhin du/lhung bzed gnyis pa
81b7('dul ba): tshel na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur legs/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig dge slong mas lhung bzed sbyang bzod
82a1('dul ba): ba mchis bzhin du lhung bzed gnyis pa tshol na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/spang ba'i lhung /
82a2('dul ba): byed du 'gyur ro//dge slob ma dang /dge tshul dang /dge tshul ma rnams kyis lhung bzed spyad bzod pa mchis bzhin du lhung bzed gnyis pa btsal na cir 'gyur lags
82a3('dul ba): nyes byas so//lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas kho na'o//sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la nyes byas su 'gyur te snga ma bzhin no//sdom la/pho nya yi ge
82a4('dul ba): lag brda dang //gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang //smon pa dang ni sems g.yengs dang //tshor ba dang ni pa 'gro ba'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan
82a5('dul ba): pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang rang gis bslangs pa'i dog pas/tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa le chos gos 'thag
82a6('dul ba): 'jug na chos gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro//zhes gsungs so//thags pa/btsun pa re shig dge slong gis/pho nya las thag pa nye du ma lags pa la/chos
82a7('dul ba): gos 'thag tu stsal nas/chos gos gribi na tsor 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//de bzhin du yi ge dang lag brda dang /gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang /brgyud pa dang //
82b1('dul ba): gzhan gyi slad du thag pa nye du ma lags pa la/chos gos 'thag tu spru la na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa re shrI ba dge slong gis/tha ga pa smyon pa la chos so/
82b2('dul ba): 'thag tu sprul nas/chos gos grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//de bzhin du thag pa sems g.yengs pa dang /tshor bas nyams theg pa dang /'on pa dang glan
82b3('dul ba): bdang /'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa nyid ma lags pa la chos gas 'theg tu skyel nas/chos gos grub na cir 'gyur rdzogs/nyes bya'o//sdom lnga/ma ning
82b4('dul ba): ma nyid dang ni//de bzhin thun mong mtshan dang ni//mi rung ba dang bdun tshan nyid//bzhi chen slob dang dge slong ma/btsun pa re shig dge slong gis thag pa me ning nye du ma lag
82b5('dul ba): pa la chos gos 'thag tu stsal nas/chos gos grub na tsIr 'gyur legs nyes byas so//de bzhin du thag pa za ma dang /ma ni dang /mtshan gnyis pa nye du ma lags
82b6('dul ba): pa la chos gos 'thag tu sprul nas/chos gos grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//btsun pa de shig dge slong gis thun tshong gi chos gos shig tha ga pa nyi du ma lags
82b7('dul ba): pa la 'thag tu stsal nas chos gos grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byaso//btsun pa ra shig dge slong gis tha ga pa nye du mi legs pa la chos gos 'thag tu stsol ba
83a1('dul ba): las mtshan gyur te/dge slong mar reng nas thob na cir 'gyur lags/sbrang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur//btsun par shig dge slong mas tha ga pa nye /
83a2('dul ba): mA lags pa la/chos gos 'thag tu stsal pas las mtshan gyur te/dge slong du red nas thob na cir 'gyur legs/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//btsun pa dge slong
83a3('dul ba): gis thag pa nye du ma lags pa la chos gos 'thag tu stsal nas/chos gos grub kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lpags sam/nyes par 'khor yod de dag/
83a4('dul ba): 'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung bar gyur la rgyu mi rung ba dang /rgyu rung bar gyur la spun mi rung ba dang /gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur pa ste/mi rung ba rnga bal dang /pa lang gi spu dang /
83a5('dul ba): ri dgas kyi bal dang /ra bas dang 'dres pa thag pa nye du mi yin pa la 'thag tu bcug nas/chos gos grub na nyes byas su 'gyur ro//btsun pa re shig bsnyen
83a6('dul ba): par ma rdzogs pa tha ga pa nye du ma lags pa la/chos gos 'thag tu stsal ba'i chos gos bgyis la/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas//
83a7('dul ba): bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la/bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags//gnyis byas so//bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis/bstan
83b1('dul ba): par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyong ba bgyis la/bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags/nyes byas so//
83b2('dul ba): bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la/bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur logs/nyes byas so///
